MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さて、試合は明後日だ。練習も今日が一番辛いだろう。よく食っておけよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, we have a match the day after tomorrow. Today's practice will be the hardest ever, so eat a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, we have a match the day after tomorrow. Today's practice will be the hardest ever, so eat a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あのよ…」
恭介@「なんだ、真人」
真人@「この段階で、相手のチームのこと、ぜんぜん知らないわけだけどよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝None of us except you even knows anything about the opposing team at all yet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝None of us except you even knows anything about the opposing team at all yet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「大丈夫だ。完璧にしておいたぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Not to worry. I've arranged it perfectly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Not to worry. I've arranged it perfectly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: って、テーブルの真ん中にノートを滑らす。
MESSAGE.EN: As he spoke, he slid a notebook to the center of the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: As he spoke, he slid a notebook to the center of the table.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐさまそれを謙吾が拾い上げる。
謙吾@「ふむ…」
謙吾@「これが対戦相手か？」
恭介@「そうだ」
謙吾@「面白いじゃないか」
真人@「どんな連中なんだ？」
人と一緒に僕もノートをのぞき見る。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and I also took a look at the notebook.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and I also took a look at the notebook.

MESSAGE.JP: 手チームのデータだろうか、選手の詳細が記されていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were details on the opposing team written on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were details on the opposing team written on it.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだこいつらは？　野球部じゃねぇじゃんか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are they? They don't belong to the baseball club.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are they? They don't belong to the baseball club.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 初の見開きは、陸上部の選手だ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was data about a member of the track club on the first spread.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was data about a member of the track club on the first spread.

MESSAGE.JP: めくると、今度はサッカー部の選手。
MESSAGE.EN: The next two pages were about a member of the soccer club.
MESSAGE.Translation: The next two pages were about a member of the soccer club.

MESSAGE.JP: かも、ふたりともキャプテンと書いてある。
MESSAGE.EN: In addition, it seems like those two are the captains of their respective clubs.
MESSAGE.Translation: In addition, it seems like those two are the captains of their respective clubs.

MESSAGE.JP: ういうことだ？
理樹@「もしかして、相手チームって、ウチの運動部のキャプテンで構成されてるの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Could it be that team consists of the captains from all the sport clubs in the school...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Could it be that team consists of the captains from all the sport clubs in the school...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ご明察」
真人@「全員三年で運動部のキャプテン…そんなチームと、素人だらけのウチのチームが戦うってかよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you sure we will be having a match with them? They're all third years and we're just beginners.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you sure we will be having a match with them? They're all third years and we're just beginners.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なんてことだ、４番にウチの主将がいる…はっはっは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Oh my... The fourth batter is the head of the Kendo club... Hahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Oh my... The fourth batter is the head of the Kendo club... Hahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…誰か手にとってくれ」
理樹@「ああ、ごめん」
にとって確かめてみると、相手チームのデータだろうか、選手の詳細が記されていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were details on the opposing team written on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were details on the opposing team written on it.

MESSAGE.JP: るほど…恭介はずっとこれの作成を頑張ってたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Now I get it... Kyousuke must've spent a lot of time on this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now I get it... Kyousuke must've spent a lot of time on this.

MESSAGE.JP: も、野球部のものではない。最初の見開きは、陸上部の選手だ。
MESSAGE.EN: What I found on the first spread was, however, not about a member of the baseball club but... about a member of the track club.
MESSAGE.Translation: What I found on the first spread was, however, not about a member of the baseball club but... about a member of the track club.

MESSAGE.JP: めくると、今度はサッカー部の選手。
MESSAGE.EN: The next pages were about a member of the soccer club.
MESSAGE.Translation: The next pages were about a member of the soccer club.

MESSAGE.JP: かも、ふたりともキャプテンと書いてある。
MESSAGE.EN: In addition, it seems like those two are the captains of their respective clubs.
MESSAGE.Translation: In addition, it seems like those two are the captains of their respective clubs.

MESSAGE.JP: ういうことだ？
恭介@「ご明察」
理樹@「いや、まだ何も察してないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I didn't even make a guess yet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I didn't even make a guess yet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだどうした」
人も覗いてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato too peered at the notebook.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato too peered at the notebook.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだこいつらは？　野球部じゃねぇじゃんか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are they? They don't belong to the baseball club.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are they? They don't belong to the baseball club.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「誰が野球部とすると言った。そんなことは一言も言っていないぞ俺は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Who ever said we were going to play against the baseball club? I know I didn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Who ever said we were going to play against the baseball club? I know I didn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「じゃあ、何部とするんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then which club are we playing against?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then which club are we playing against?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「運動部全部」
真人@「へ」
恭介@「そのノートに挙げてある我が校の、運動部のキャプテンが結集したチームとだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝In this notebook I've gathered info on all the captains of the sports clubs in our school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝In this notebook I've gathered info on all the captains of the sports clubs in our school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の席だけ一瞬静寂が訪れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Our table was momentarily shrouded in a heavy silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our table was momentarily shrouded in a heavy silence.

MESSAGE.JP: の後、謙吾と真人が同時にどういうことだーっ！と恭介に詰め寄る。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, Kengo and Masato both shouted out ❛What the hell are you thinking!!❜ to Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, Kengo and Masato both shouted out ❛What the hell are you thinking!!❜ to Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「全員三年で運動部のキャプテン…そんなチームと、素人だらけのウチのチームが戦うってかよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you sure we will be having a match with them? They're all third years and we're just beginners.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you sure we will be having a match with them? They're all third years and we're just beginners.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「待てぇ…４番にウチの主将がいるぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Wait a minute... The fourth batter is the head of the Kendo club...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Wait a minute... The fourth batter is the head of the Kendo club...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ、ほんとだ…」
理樹@「で、野球部のキャプテンは８番なんだ…わけがわからない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And the eighth batter is the captain of the baseball club... I have no idea what's going on anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And the eighth batter is the captain of the baseball club... I have no idea what's going on anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、向こうも野球に関しては素人。同じだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's okay. When it comes to baseball, they're also amateurs like us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's okay. When it comes to baseball, they're also amateurs like us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「後は俺たちが、この短期間でどれだけチームとして成長しているかによるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Everything depends on us now. The outcome of the game depends on how much we've grown as a baseball team over the last few days.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Everything depends on us now. The outcome of the game depends on how much we've grown as a baseball team over the last few days.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「勝てるわけねぇだろう、向こうは運動のスペシャリストばっかりなんだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How could we win against them!? They're all sports specialists!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How could we win against them!? They're all sports specialists!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうとも限らない。人望で決まることのほうが多いだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That isn't necessarily the case. Most of the time the strength of a sports team depends on how well the team is organized.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That isn't necessarily the case. Most of the time the strength of a sports team depends on how well the team is organized.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「じゃあ、なんでこいつらなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then why have them as our opponents?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then why have them as our opponents?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「勝った時、爽快じゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Coz it will be exhilarating if we knock them down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Coz it will be exhilarating if we knock them down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の一言。
った一言。
えるほどに明快だ。
りゃそうだ。運動部のキャプテン全員を敵に回して勝ったら、爽快だ。
MESSAGE.EN: He's absolutely right. If we beat up all the sports club captains, we will feel nothing save fantastic.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's absolutely right. If we beat up all the sports club captains, we will feel nothing save fantastic.

MESSAGE.JP: 台としては最高のシチュエーションだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I have no complaints about the stage he's built for us.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have no complaints about the stage he's built for us.

MESSAGE.JP: して、きっと今日までそのことを言わなかった理由は、メンバーが単に揃ってなかっただけなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And now I can tell that the reason why Kyousuke didn't tell us about our opponents until today is that he needed time to gather the enemy team.
MESSAGE.Translation: And now I can tell that the reason why Kyousuke didn't tell us about our opponents until today is that he needed time to gather the enemy team.

MESSAGE.JP: 介がひとりずつ口説いていく姿が思い浮かぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: I can easily imagine how he was persuading each of the captains.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can easily imagine how he was persuading each of the captains.

MESSAGE.JP: の厳格な剣道部の主将まで連れ出してくるなんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder, how did he ever get the Kendo club captain to feel like playing baseball?
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder, how did he ever get the Kendo club captain to feel like playing baseball?

MESSAGE.JP: んな人が連れ出せるなら、味方にすればいいのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish he'd asked him to join our team.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish he'd asked him to join our team.

MESSAGE.JP: っちは僕が集めてきた女子だけで、ひとり違っていただけでもどれだけ戦力の差が縮まっていたか。
MESSAGE.EN: Most of our team members are girls, so he would be a great asset for us if he were on our side.
MESSAGE.Translation: Most of our team members are girls, so he would be a great asset for us if he were on our side.

MESSAGE.JP: も、それをしないのが恭介だ。それもわかっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course I know Kyousuke doesn't do that sort of thing. Because it's not his style.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course I know Kyousuke doesn't do that sort of thing. Because it's not his style.

MESSAGE.JP: れ果てた後、僕は納得し、恭介の思惑通りにこの戦いを面白く思い始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Although I was completely stunned at first, just like Kyousuke must have predicted, I was already starting to think that this match might be quite interesting.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although I was completely stunned at first, just like Kyousuke must have predicted, I was already starting to think that this match might be quite interesting.

MESSAGE.JP: ったら本当に最高の気分だろうな。
MESSAGE.EN: If we win we'll feel like the top of the world.
MESSAGE.Translation: If we win we'll feel like the top of the world.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「はっはっは、いいじゃないか」
吾は最初から乗り気だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo is ready and willing already.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo is ready and willing already.

MESSAGE.JP: 人も僕と同じ考えに至ったのだろうか、ふん、とひとつ鼻をならした後、大人しく座り直した。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato snorted and reseated himself calmly. He'd probably come to the same conclusion.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato snorted and reseated himself calmly. He'd probably come to the same conclusion.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「で…どうだ、鈴。いけそうか？」
後に恭介は、一言も発していない鈴に向けて訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally he asked his sister, who hadn't said anything yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally he asked his sister, who hadn't said anything yet.

MESSAGE.JP: うか、忘れてた。
とりでぽつんと鈴は座ったままでいた。
を向いたまま小さな声で一言だけ発した。
MESSAGE.EN: Without raising her face, she said only one thing quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without raising her face, she said only one thing quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「時間をくれ…」
して、顔を左右にぶるぶるぶるぶるーっ！と震わせたのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: And then, slowly, she turned her face to the left and right! She was shaking her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then, slowly, she turned her face to the left and right! She was shaking her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん？」
内新聞が張り出されていた。
妖怪ヒャッホー現る!?』
月二十四日未明、多数の生徒が同時に夜の校舎からの奇妙な声を聞くという事件が起こった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was an incident where a number of students heard a strange voice coming from the school building in the early hours of May 24th.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was an incident where a number of students heard a strange voice coming from the school building in the early hours of May 24th.

MESSAGE.JP: 門家の話によると、これは学園に伝わる七不思議のひとつ、『ヒャッホーと叫ぶ妖怪』の仕業であると…。
MESSAGE.EN: According to a specialist, this was the work of one of the school's seven mysteries: ❛The Phantom Who Yells Yahoo.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: According to a specialist, this was the work of one of the school's seven mysteries: ❛The Phantom Who Yells Yahoo.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（やばっ、これ１００％僕だっ!!）
自身が七不思議のひとつになってしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd become one of the seven mysteries...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd become one of the seven mysteries...

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ふぁぁ」
室に入ってくるなり、西園さんがあくびをひとつ。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san let out a yawn as she entered the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san let out a yawn as she entered the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしたの？　眠そうだね」
西園@「実は…」
の後みんなからメールが届いて、その着信音で寝付けなかったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She told me the incoming message sounds from mails she'd received from our teammates last night had kept her from getting sleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: She told me the incoming message sounds from mails she'd received from our teammates last night had kept her from getting sleep.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「せっかく皆さんからメールをもらったので、なんとか返信しようと思ったのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I was glad everybody emailed me, so I thought I had to reply to them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I was glad everybody emailed me, so I thought I had to reply to them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 団の中で携帯と格闘して、結局あまり眠れなかったとか。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, she'd struggled with the cellphone in her bed and couldn't get enough sleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, she'd struggled with the cellphone in her bed and couldn't get enough sleep.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とりあえず、マナーモードの仕方を教えれば良かったね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝First of all, I guess I should teach you how to switch to silent mode...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝First of all, I guess I should teach you how to switch to silent mode...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「よろしくお願いします…」
西園@「ふぁぁ」
う一度、あくび。
わてて、口を手で押さえた。
クド@「ぐっどもーにんぐです～」
理樹@「クドはしっかり寝れたの？」
クド@「はい、朝までぐっすりでしたが何か…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, I got a very good night's sleep... Why did you ask that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, I got a very good night's sleep... Why did you ask that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はっ！　まさか私の知らない間にびっぐくらんちでも起きましたかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hah! Did some kinda happening take place while I was sleeping?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hah! Did some kinda happening take place while I was sleeping?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「起きてない起きてない…というか、なんでもないよ。ごめん」
園さんと同室のはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: In spite of having been in the same room, why didn't she notice what happened to her roommate?
MESSAGE.Translation: In spite of having been in the same room, why didn't she notice what happened to her roommate?

MESSAGE.JP: すがはクド、と言うべきなのかな。
み時間。
は逃げるように教室を出ていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin dashed out of the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin dashed out of the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: るで朝受けた宣告から、現実逃避するように。
MESSAGE.EN: It was as if she was running away from what Kyousuke had said during breakfast.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was as if she was running away from what Kyousuke had said during breakfast.

MESSAGE.JP: かに、あの人見知りの激しい鈴だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Sure enough, Rin's shyness is of extreme proportions.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sure enough, Rin's shyness is of extreme proportions.

MESSAGE.JP: 戦相手が全員同じ学校の先輩、しかも各運動部のキャプテン…。
MESSAGE.EN: The opponents are all upperclassmen, and captains of the sport clubs at that...
MESSAGE.Translation: The opponents are all upperclassmen, and captains of the sport clubs at that...

MESSAGE.JP: んな現実は受け入れがたいものだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It can't be an easy reality for her to come to terms with.
MESSAGE.Translation: It can't be an easy reality for her to come to terms with.

MESSAGE.JP: 介だってわかってたくせに…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure Kyousuke also knew this would happen...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure Kyousuke also knew this would happen...

MESSAGE.JP: までずっと鈴は恭介の後ろに隠れて、それを見て楽しんできたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Until now Rin has always safely enjoyed watching what Kyousuke's doing from behind him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Until now Rin has always safely enjoyed watching what Kyousuke's doing from behind him.

MESSAGE.JP: きなり先頭に立たされても困惑する以外に反応しようがない。
MESSAGE.EN: And now she is suddenly expected to lead us. How could she not be confused about it?
MESSAGE.Translation: And now she is suddenly expected to lead us. How could she not be confused about it?

MESSAGE.JP: も、僕もその話を聞いて一度は、面白いと感じた。
MESSAGE.EN: But even I thought it was going to be an interesting game, when I heard about the opposing team.
MESSAGE.Translation: But even I thought it was going to be an interesting game, when I heard about the opposing team.

MESSAGE.JP: ういう点では恭介と一緒か…。
MESSAGE.EN: So he and I aren't different in that respect...
MESSAGE.Translation: So he and I aren't different in that respect...

MESSAGE.JP: だ、鈴が頷いてくれさえすればよかったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish she could have also nodded at that time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish she could have also nodded at that time.

MESSAGE.JP: うしたら、みんなで楽しめたのに。
MESSAGE.EN: If she had, every one of us could have fully enjoyed it.
MESSAGE.Translation: If she had, every one of us could have fully enjoyed it.

MESSAGE.JP: はいつものように、猫の輪の中で、紙切れを開いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was, as always, in the center of her cats and staring at a piece of paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was, as always, in the center of her cats and staring at a piece of paper.

MESSAGE.JP: しい課題だ。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, she'd gotten another task to solve.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, she'd gotten another task to solve.

MESSAGE.JP: れさえあれば鈴は、とりあえず試合のことは忘れて、奔走できる。
MESSAGE.EN: Working on it should help her put the match out of her mind for now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Working on it should help her put the match out of her mind for now.

MESSAGE.JP: が、その目は信じられないようなものでも見るかのように見開かれている。
MESSAGE.EN: However, Rin's eyes were wide open, as though she'd seen something she's unable to accept.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, Rin's eyes were wide open, as though she'd seen something she's unable to accept.

MESSAGE.JP: めん、と言って猫をかき分け、鈴の持つ紙切れを脇からのぞき込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I said sorry to the cats as I pushed them aside to approach her, and read what was written on the paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said sorry to the cats as I pushed them aside to approach her, and read what was written on the paper.

MESSAGE.JP: 『次の指令を待て』
も思考が一瞬止まった。
MESSAGE.EN: My thoughts completely ground to a halt for a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: My thoughts completely ground to a halt for a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹…これはどういう意味だ？」
理樹@「そのままの意味だね…」
理樹@「次の指令を待て、と。また改めて、課題を書いた紙が届くんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It says to wait for the next letter, so we have to wait for the day another letter arrives.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It says to wait for the next letter, so we have to wait for the day another letter arrives.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それはいつだ？　今日じゃないのか？　明日なのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝When will that be? Isn't it today? Will it be tomorrow?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝When will that be? Isn't it today? Will it be tomorrow?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、このメモからはそこまではわからないけど…」
の予測では今日はない。
MESSAGE.EN: In my opinion it wouldn't be today.
MESSAGE.Translation: In my opinion it wouldn't be today.

MESSAGE.JP: 日中に出せるのなら、わざわざ待てなんて指示を送ってくる必要はないからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Because there'd be no need to write this note, if the sender wanted us to do something today.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because there'd be no need to write this note, if the sender wanted us to do something today.

MESSAGE.JP: も馬鹿じゃない。それぐらいわかってるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I think Rin should already realize that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think Rin should already realize that.

MESSAGE.JP: 切れをポケットにしまうと、用は済んだとばかりに、身を翻した。
MESSAGE.EN: She put the note into her pocket and turned around.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put the note into her pocket and turned around.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃーみゃーと寄ってくる猫たちに目配せもなく。
MESSAGE.EN: She wasn't even paying any mind to the cats trying to get her attention.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wasn't even paying any mind to the cats trying to get her attention.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「参ったな…」
こから、励ましのメールを送っておく。
相手は先輩じゃない』
MESSAGE.EN: [The people you have to care about aren't those captains.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [The people you have to care about aren't those captains.]

MESSAGE.JP: 僕だけ見て投げればいいんだよ』、と。
MESSAGE.EN: [You just need to look at me and throw the ball.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [You just need to look at me and throw the ball.]

MESSAGE.JP: ャイムが鳴ると同時に隣の席の真人と談笑。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as the bell rang, I started chatting with Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as the bell rang, I started chatting with Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: た喉が渇いてきたな…。
ュースを買いに行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll go and get a soft drink.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll go and get a soft drink.

MESSAGE.JP: 下を歩いていると、大荷物を抱えた小毬さんを見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I was walking down a hallway, I came across Komari-san, who was hauling something large.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I was walking down a hallway, I came across Komari-san, who was hauling something large.

MESSAGE.JP: に抱えてるのは、大量の古い本のようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a large pile of old books.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a large pile of old books.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「わっせっ、わっせっ」
け声を上げながら、とてとてとこっちに歩いてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Speaking to herself, she was getting closer to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Speaking to herself, she was getting closer to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「小毬さん」
前が見えてなさそうなので、横から声を掛けてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The books were blocking her view, so I spoke up from her side.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The books were blocking her view, so I spoke up from her side.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あ、理樹君」
小毬@「こんにちは～」
こやかに挨拶をするが、手がぷるぷると震えていた。とても重いらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She greeted me with a smile, although her hands were trembling. Seemed like the books were really heavy.
MESSAGE.Translation: She greeted me with a smile, although her hands were trembling. Seemed like the books were really heavy.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「手伝おうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can help you if you need.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can help you if you need.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「へいきへいきー」
小毬@「あっ」
さどさ、と二冊の本がこぼれ落ちた。
MESSAGE.EN: Two of the books dropped down onto the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Two of the books dropped down onto the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「よ、よいしょっ」
を片手に持ち直して、それを拾いにかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: She held the rest of the books in one hand and tried to pick up the fallen books.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held the rest of the books in one hand and tried to pick up the fallen books.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、それは…」
さどさどさっ!!
やっぱり豪快に全部落とした。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As I'd expected, she dropped the rest of them, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As I'd expected, she dropped the rest of them, too.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ああうっ…」
ゅう。ばさばさばさーっ!!
から吹き込んできた突風に本が煽られると、ページが一気に抜けて、辺りに散らばっていった。
MESSAGE.EN: A gust of wind from an open window blew through the opened books, tearing out loose pages and scattering them around.
MESSAGE.Translation: A gust of wind from an open window blew through the opened books, tearing out loose pages and scattering them around.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ああああう～…」
理樹@「いやまあ…」
れだ…哀れすぎる…。
とまず僕も手伝って、散らばったページを拾い集めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I helped her gather them up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I helped her gather them up.

MESSAGE.JP: 程古い本だったらしく、色もすっかり茶色に変色している。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like they were really old books, as the pages had completely turned brown.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like they were really old books, as the pages had completely turned brown.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ありがと～、理樹君」
理樹@「これで全部だと思うよ」
小毬@「あうう…一冊ダメにしちゃった…しょんぼり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Auu... This one isn't a book anymore... so sad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Auu... This one isn't a book anymore... so sad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあずいぶん古い本だったし、しょうがないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That one was really old anyway, so you don't have to worry about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That one was really old anyway, so you don't have to worry about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん～」
小毬@「あっ」
小毬@「どうしよう、これページが入れ替わってて、３ページ目でいきなりトリックがわかっちゃうよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh no, some pages are in the wrong order and the third page reveals what the trick was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh no, some pages are in the wrong order and the third page reveals what the trick was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、戻せばいいと思うよ」
理樹@「…とりあえず半分だけでもいいからさ、持たせてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Anyways, will you let me help you...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Anyways, will you let me help you...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うえーん、ごめんね～…」
理樹@「ところでこんな古い本、どうするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What exactly are you carrying these old books for, by the way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What exactly are you carrying these old books for, by the way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、ずいぶん古くなっちゃってたから、新しいのに取り替えるんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝They're going to be replaced with new ones.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝They're going to be replaced with new ones.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほど…」
あ確かに、ページが抜け落ちるほど古いものだったら、新版に取り替えた方がいいと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I think it must be because the pages don't hold together any more.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think it must be because the pages don't hold together any more.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「じゃあ、気を取り直して…」
小毬@「資料室にれっつごー、おー」
さ。
また一冊落ちた。
小毬@「ほわあっ」
理樹@「…これも僕が持つよ…」
幸な目に遭うのは、本人の問題もあるよなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's like her personality invites disaster.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's like her personality invites disaster.

MESSAGE.JP: 料室のダンボールに本を詰め込むと、教室に戻ることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: We packed the books into boxes in the reference room, and left for the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: We packed the books into boxes in the reference room, and left for the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ところで何で小毬さんがあの本を運んでたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝By the way, why did you have to bring those books there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝By the way, why did you have to bring those books there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふえ？　あれは今度リサイクルのバザーに寄付するんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? Those ones are going to be donated to a recycle bazaar.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? Those ones are going to be donated to a recycle bazaar.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「だから資料室にとっておくんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝So we're keeping them in that room until then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝So we're keeping them in that room until then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 微妙に話がズレていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Her answer was a little bit off from what I had wanted to know.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Her answer was a little bit off from what I had wanted to know.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「小毬さんって図書委員だっけ？」
小毬@「ううん、ちがいますよ～」
理樹@「いや、じゃあ何で小毬さんが本を運んでたのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, why did you have to take care of those books?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, why did you have to take care of those books?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「なんで？」
小毬@「うーん？」
小毬@「ふむう…」
理樹@「いやまあ、そこまで悩まなくても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is it that hard to come up with the answer...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is it that hard to come up with the answer...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: うやらノーリーズンらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Seemingly she had no reason to.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seemingly she had no reason to.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「でも、助かっちゃったよー。今度美味しいどーなつのお店があるから、ごちそうしますねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You sure helped me out anyway. I'll take you to a donut shop and buy you yummy donuts in compensation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You sure helped me out anyway. I'll take you to a donut shop and buy you yummy donuts in compensation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、うん…楽しみにしてるよ」
小毬@「じゃあ、ありがと～」
小毬@「ららーららんら～」
ご機嫌な様子で教室に帰っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She returned to the classroom in a good mood.
MESSAGE.Translation: She returned to the classroom in a good mood.

MESSAGE.JP: あ、小毬さんはそういう人なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe she likes doing that sort of thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe she likes doing that sort of thing.

MESSAGE.JP: んか、損な役回りばっかり引き受けてるだけのような気もするけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Personally it looks to me like she always has things pushed onto her that other people don't want to do...
MESSAGE.Translation: Personally it looks to me like she always has things pushed onto her that other people don't want to do...

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「じゃあ、これ資料室にもってかないといけないから～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I have to take these books to the reference room. See you later～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I have to take these books to the reference room. See you later～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか、頑張ってね」
小毬@「うん、がんばるよー」
小毬@「わっせっ、わっせっ」
毬さんはそのまま廊下を歩いていった。
理樹@「すまない、僕は今さすらうことにしたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry but I've decided to go wander.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry but I've decided to go wander.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「手伝ってあげたいのは山々だけど、とても出来そうにない。次の瞬間、僕らは敵同士なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm afraid I can't help you right now. In another moment we will be enemies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm afraid I can't help you right now. In another moment we will be enemies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「理樹君は戦う男なんだね…」
小毬@「じゃあこっちはすぐやっておくよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, I'll get this work done quickly!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, I'll get this work done quickly!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すまないね…」
小毬@「のーぷろぶれむだよ～」
毬さんは足早に資料室へ向かっていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She headed for the reference room at a quick pace.
MESSAGE.Translation: She headed for the reference room at a quick pace.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ついさっきまで笑顔だった僕らが、竜虎の如く対峙する…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We used to be smiling together, but now we have to fight like a dragon and tiger...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We used to be smiling together, but now we have to fight like a dragon and tiger...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「けれど、僕らはもうそこから戻れないんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝However, we're already past the point of no return...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝However, we're already past the point of no return...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 酷な運命だ。
MESSAGE.EN: What a cruel fate this is.
MESSAGE.Translation: What a cruel fate this is.

MESSAGE.JP: う…僕は生きる価値を自分でつかみ取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I will find the value of my life and grab it on my own.
MESSAGE.Translation: I will find the value of my life and grab it on my own.

MESSAGE.JP: はまだ悩んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin still hadn't reached a decision.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin still hadn't reached a decision.

MESSAGE.JP: ノンがその手に前足をかけても顔は綻ばない。
MESSAGE.EN: Lennon put its pads onto her hands, but she wouldn't even smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lennon put its pads onto her hands, but she wouldn't even smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「鈴。そこまで臆することはない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, you don't have to be that afraid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, you don't have to be that afraid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「臆するわ」
恭介@「どうして」
鈴@「だって、こんなのが、わんさといるんだろうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The enemy team consists of tall guys like them, doesn't it? Which is why...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The enemy team consists of tall guys like them, doesn't it? Which is why...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人と謙吾を指さして言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed at Masato and Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed at Masato and Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、否定はしない」
鈴@「想像するだけでこわいじゃないかっ」
真人@「どうすんだよ、鈴は今からでも外野に回したほうがいいんじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are we gonna do? Wouldn't it be better to let her play outfield?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are we gonna do? Wouldn't it be better to let her play outfield?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「あのな、真人」
恭介@「鈴がリトルバスターズのエースなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She is the ace of the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She is the ace of the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「違うか？」
真人@「まあ、そうなっちゃいるけどさ…」
恭介@「というわけで頑張ってもらうぞ、鈴」
鈴@「うーみゅ…」
りこくる。
恭介@「ったく、完璧な舞台ができあがったというのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Sheesh, and I've already prepared a perfect stage for you to step onto...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Sheesh, and I've already prepared a perfect stage for you to step onto...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうすりゃ投げる気になるんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝How can we get you to pitch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝How can we get you to pitch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「相手が小学生だったら投げてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll do it if our opponents are elementary school kids.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll do it if our opponents are elementary school kids.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なら小学生だと思って投げろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then pretend that they are elementary school kids.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then pretend that they are elementary school kids.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こんなでかい小学生いたらびびるわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'd be scared if I met elementary school kids like them!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'd be scared if I met elementary school kids like them!❞

MESSAGE.JP: た真人と謙吾を指さす。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet again she pointed at Masato and Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet again she pointed at Masato and Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「時間を捻出してもらうだけでも大変だったのに、この上、全員に可愛らしいマスコット系のキャラクターに扮装してくれとは、さすがに俺でも頼めないぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I already convinced them to spend their precious time with us, so I don't think I can ask them to put on cute stuffed animal suits during the match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I already convinced them to spend their precious time with us, so I don't think I can ask them to put on cute stuffed animal suits during the match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは、全員やめるだろうね…わざわざ部活の時間を割いてまで、相手してくれるのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you asked them, they would all go home... The fact itself that they've agreed to play a game with us should be really appreciated...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you asked them, they would all go home... The fact itself that they've agreed to play a game with us should be really appreciated...❞

MESSAGE.JP: う考えると、恭介はどこまで幅を利かせてることになるんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: From that angle, I wonder, just how heavy an influence does Kyousuke have in our school?
MESSAGE.Translation: From that angle, I wonder, just how heavy an influence does Kyousuke have in our school?

MESSAGE.JP: く考えてみると、ものすごいことなんじゃないか、それは。
MESSAGE.EN: That might be what I should be most surprised at.
MESSAGE.Translation: That might be what I should be most surprised at.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「さて、どうしたものやらな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What are we going do about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What are we going do about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: で頭を抱える。
MESSAGE.EN: All of us have our heads in our hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of us have our heads in our hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「まあ、元気だせ。ゼリーやるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, cheer up. Here's cups of jelly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, cheer up. Here's cups of jelly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「問題の中心が励ますな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You're the one that has to think about it the most.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You're the one that has to think about it the most.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どーしろちゅーねん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I have no clue what to do!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I have no clue what to do!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「頑張れ」
鈴@「こわい」
恭介@「鈴。そこまで臆することはない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, you don't need to be that scared.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, you don't need to be that scared.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「むちゃくちゃこわいっ」
鈴@「いや、もーくちゃくちゃだっ」
鈴@「くちゃくちゃこわいっ」
恭介@「落ち着けって」
鈴@「だって、こんなのが、わんさといるんだろうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But, the opponent team consists of tall guys like them, doesn't it!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But, the opponent team consists of tall guys like them, doesn't it!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人と謙吾を指さして言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed at Masato and Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed at Masato and Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、否定はしない」
鈴@「そんな世界いやだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't want a world like that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't want a world like that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そこまで大規模にわらわらとはいないが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There are less of them around than you think...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There are less of them around than you think...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうすんだよ、鈴は今からでも外野に回したほうがいいんじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are we gonna do about it? I think you should let her play outfield.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are we gonna do about it? I think you should let her play outfield.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「あのな、真人」
恭介@「鈴がリトルバスターズのエースなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin is the ace of the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin is the ace of the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「違うか？」
真人@「まあ、そうなっちゃいるけどさ…」
恭介@「というわけで頑張ってもらうぞ、鈴」
鈴@「やじゃ」
恭介@「素直に兄の言うことを聞け」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just do what your brother's telling you to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just do what your brother's telling you to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なお、やじゃ」
恭介@「まったくあまのじゃくな奴だな…」
恭介@「完璧な舞台ができあがったというのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I've already prepared a perfect stage for you to step onto, yet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I've already prepared a perfect stage for you to step onto, yet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうすりゃいいんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝How can we get you to pitch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝How can we get you to pitch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「謙吾と真人が間に立っていてくれたら投げてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll do it if Kengo and Masato stand by me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll do it if Kengo and Masato stand by me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「真人が間に立っていてくれたら投げてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll do it if Masato stands between us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll do it if Masato stands between us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「常にバントシフトになるね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That means we'll have to play bunt defense all the time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That means we'll have to play bunt defense all the time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいの？」
恭介@「いいわけあるか」
理樹@「だよね…」
なると、やはり鈴は真正面から先輩たちと相対する他ない。
MESSAGE.EN: So, she'll have to face those captains head-on. That's the only way left.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, she'll have to face those captains head-on. That's the only way left.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「時間を捻出してもらうだけでも大変だったのに、この上、全員に可愛らしいマスコット系のキャラクターに扮装してくれとは、さすがに俺でも頼めないぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I already convinced them to spend their precious time with us, so I don't think I can ask them to put on cute stuffed animal suits during the match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I already convinced them to spend their precious time with us, so I don't think I can ask them to put on cute stuffed animal suits during the match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは、全員やめるだろうね…わざわざ部活の時間を割いてまでして相手してくれるのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you asked them, they would all go home... The fact itself that they've agreed to play a game with us should be really appreciated...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you asked them, they would all go home... The fact itself that they've agreed to play a game with us should be really appreciated...❞

MESSAGE.JP: う考えると、恭介はどこまで幅を利かせてることになるんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: From that angle, I wonder, just how much influence does Kyousuke have in our school?
MESSAGE.Translation: From that angle, I wonder, just how much influence does Kyousuke have in our school?

MESSAGE.JP: のすごいことなんじゃないのか、よく考えてみると、それは。
MESSAGE.EN: Isn't that what I should be the most surprised about?
MESSAGE.Translation: Isn't that what I should be the most surprised about?

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「さて、どうしたものやらな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So then, what are we going to do about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So then, what are we going to do about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: で頭を抱える。
MESSAGE.EN: All of us had our heads in our hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of us had our heads in our hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「まあ、元気だせ。ゼリーやるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, cheer up. Have some cup jelly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, cheer up. Have some cup jelly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「問題の中心が励ますな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You're the one that has to think about it the most.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You're the one that has to think about it the most.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どーしろちゅーねん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I have no clue what to do!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I have no clue what to do!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「頑張れ」
鈴@「やじゃ」
供の喧嘩のようになってきた…。
MESSAGE.EN: At this rate we're getting nowhere...
MESSAGE.Translation: At this rate we're getting nowhere...

MESSAGE.JP: あ実際、片や最高の爽快感を味わうという私欲を満たすためだけに躍起になってる人。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, Kyousuke probably just wants to satisfy his selfish desire; getting a fantastic feeling out of beating up the captains.
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, Kyousuke probably just wants to satisfy his selfish desire; getting a fantastic feeling out of beating up the captains.

MESSAGE.JP: や人見知りが激しすぎるだけの人、という子供みたいな理由だから無理もないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: On the other hand, Rin is just impossibly shy. In the end they're both totally like kids.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the other hand, Rin is just impossibly shy. In the end they're both totally like kids.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃあ、こうしよう。何度でもタイムかけていいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, how about this? You can call a time out as many times as you want to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, how about this? You can call a time out as many times as you want to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「たいむ？」
恭介@「ああ、おまえがタイムをかけたら、ここにいるメンバーがすぐさまおまえを囲ってこの状況を作ってやることができる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah. When you do that, the four of us run up and huddle around you like we do now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah. When you do that, the four of us run up and huddle around you like we do now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「その間、なにをするんだ？」
恭介@「おまえが落ち着くまでいつものように馬鹿話でもしてるさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We'll just talk smack like usual until you're able to relax.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We'll just talk smack like usual until you're able to relax.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「だから、てんぱったらすぐ言え。な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, you'll just let us know when you get nervous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, you'll just let us know when you get nervous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んて恭介は扱いに手慣れてるんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: He knows how to handle his sister surprisingly well.
MESSAGE.Translation: He knows how to handle his sister surprisingly well.

MESSAGE.JP: はしばらく考えた後…
MESSAGE.EN: She pondered for a while and...
MESSAGE.Translation: She pondered for a while and...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…わかった」
いた。
室に戻る途中…
MESSAGE.EN: When we were on the way back to the classroom...
MESSAGE.Translation: When we were on the way back to the classroom...

MESSAGE.JP: の鳴き声が聞こえた気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought I heard a cat crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought I heard a cat crying.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「空耳、かな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝My ears are playing tricks on me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝My ears are playing tricks on me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 違う。確かに聞こえる。
真人@「どうした、理樹」
理樹@「え？　いや、別に大したことじゃ…」
理樹@「先いってて」
真人@「なんだよ」
理樹@「なんでもないから」
真人@「そうかよ…」
てくされたように渡り廊下を歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He walked down the connecting corridor in a sulk.
MESSAGE.Translation: He walked down the connecting corridor in a sulk.

MESSAGE.JP: に誘ってもよかったけど、それほど楽しいことじゃないだろうし、仕方ない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not that I didn't want to go with him, but I suspect this won't be anything he'd enjoy, so it couldn't be helped.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not that I didn't want to go with him, but I suspect this won't be anything he'd enjoy, so it couldn't be helped.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん、昨日借りた本なんだけど、真人が隣でうるさくて最後まで読めなかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry. Last night Masato was so noisy I couldn't finish the book you lent me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry. Last night Masato was so noisy I couldn't finish the book you lent me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「なるほど」
得してる。
西園さんも真人のことは分かってるんだなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Looks like she also knows what kind of guy Masato is.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Looks like she also knows what kind of guy Masato is.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「では、ここで読みますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Do you want to read it right here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Do you want to read it right here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「この時期は特に風が涼しくて、本を読むのにはとても良い場所です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝There's a nice cool breeze here during this season, so this is a good place to enjoy reading.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝There's a nice cool breeze here during this season, so this is a good place to enjoy reading.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ、でも……」
の樹の下は、西園さんの居場所だと思っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had thought this was her special place.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had thought this was her special place.

MESSAGE.JP: いいのだろうか。
がその場所に踏み込んでしまっても。
事をためらっている僕を不思議に思っているみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like she's wondering why I won't answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like she's wondering why I won't answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が考えすぎているだけか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Am I just reading too much into it?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Am I just reading too much into it?

MESSAGE.JP: らば、厚意に甘えよう。
MESSAGE.EN: All right, I think I'll accept her kind offer.
MESSAGE.Translation: All right, I think I'll accept her kind offer.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ありがとう」
理樹@「さすがに夜は無理だから、我慢して部屋で読むけれどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I can't read in the dark, so I'll go back to my room before then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I can't read in the dark, so I'll go back to my room before then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そうですね」
西園@「昨日のを読み終えたら、次の分も用意してありますので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Once you're finished, I'm going to give you another one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Once you're finished, I'm going to give you another one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんがお薦めの小説を列挙してくれる。
偵役がトイレの名前みたいなのも彼女のお気に入りらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She said the mystery novel with a detective whose name sounded like a restroom was her particular favorite.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said the mystery novel with a detective whose name sounded like a restroom was her particular favorite.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「……これは、まだちょっと早いですね」
ッグの中から随分と薄い本がちらっと見えたけど、西園さんはそれをすぐに入れてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: She had picked up a very thin book from her bag, but returned it there quickly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had picked up a very thin book from her bag, but returned it there quickly.

MESSAGE.JP: なんの本だろう。ちょっと気になる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What is that book about, I wonder.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What is that book about, I wonder.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「あれ、理樹じゃないか」
ンドイッチを摘んでいると、恭介が通りかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: While we were eating sandwiches, Kyousuke showed up.
MESSAGE.Translation: While we were eating sandwiches, Kyousuke showed up.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「西園も一緒か」
西園@「こんにちは」
く頭を下げる。
恭介@「邪魔しちゃ、悪いな」
理樹@「べ、別にそんなんじゃないよ」
恭介@「はは、俺はそれほど野暮じゃねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Haha, I'm not as stupid as you think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Haha, I'm not as stupid as you think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: るり、と背中を向け…ようとした恭介が止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: He was about to turn around... but.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was about to turn around... but.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「腹、減った」
理樹@「まだ食べてないの？」
恭介@「ああ…理樹、それうまそうだな」
介の視線は、僕が持っているサンドイッチに向けられていた。
MESSAGE.EN: He was staring at the sandwich I was holding.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was staring at the sandwich I was holding.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、これは…」
恭介@「一個ぐらい、いいだろう」
うが早いか、恭介が僕の手ごとかぶりつくようにサンドイッチを口にする。
MESSAGE.EN: Soon as he finished saying that, he took a big bite out of the sandwich in my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Soon as he finished saying that, he took a big bite out of the sandwich in my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「うん、うまい」
介の唾が、僕の手に少しつく。
MESSAGE.EN: I got a little of his saliva on my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got a little of his saliva on my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「汚いなあ…」
西園@「…どうぞ」
ィッシュを渡してくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me a piece of tissue.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me a piece of tissue.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありがとう」
西園@「…い、いえ」
ぜか僕の方をまっすぐ見ようとしない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know why, but she won't look at me straight.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know why, but she won't look at me straight.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ごめんね、西園さん」
れから、恭介の方を向く。
MESSAGE.EN: And I turned my gaze on Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I turned my gaze on Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介。それは西園さんのなんだから、西園さんに断ってからにしてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, that sandwich was Nishizono-san's, so you should've asked her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, that sandwich was Nishizono-san's, so you should've asked her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうだったのか…」
恭介@「すまなかったな、西園」
すがに悪いと思ったらしく、殊勝な顔をして恭介が謝った。
MESSAGE.EN: He seemed to take it seriously and apologized sincerely.
MESSAGE.Translation: He seemed to take it seriously and apologized sincerely.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「サンドイッチ、うまかったよ」
恭介@「ごちそうさま」
西園@「…どういたしまして」
園さんが微笑む。
西園@「…こちらこそ」
さく、そう付け加えて。
西園@「…仲が良いのですね。直枝さんと棗さんは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You two look really close, Naoe-san and Natsume-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You two look really close, Naoe-san and Natsume-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ？　恭介と？」
理樹@「…まあ、悪くはないと思うけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, I don't think that's wrong either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, I don't think that's wrong either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「昔からの友達だし」
西園@「棗さん×直枝さん…」
西園@「いえ、ここは意表をついて直枝さん×棗さんというのも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, I want a surprise, so Naoe-san X Natsume-san would be good...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, I want a surprise, so Naoe-san X Natsume-san would be good...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…なるほど」
西園@「逆転というのも悪くないです」
やら頷いている。
西園@「…直枝さん、どうかいつまでも棗さんと仲良くしてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, please cherish your friendship with him forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, please cherish your friendship with him forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん」
が何だか分からないままに返事をする。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered without really understanding what she was talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered without really understanding what she was talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ほぅ」
園さんは僕の返事を聞くと、満足そうにそっと息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: When she heard my answer she let out a sigh of satisfaction.
MESSAGE.Translation: When she heard my answer she let out a sigh of satisfaction.

MESSAGE.JP: 室に戻る途中…
MESSAGE.EN: When I was on the way back to the classroom...
MESSAGE.Translation: When I was on the way back to the classroom...

MESSAGE.JP: の鳴き声が聞こえた気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought I heard a cat crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought I heard a cat crying.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「空耳、かな？」
違う。確かに聞こえる。
室に戻ると、すぐ真人に何か今朝の件について進展があったか訊いてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I arrived in the classroom I asked Masato if there had been any progress after the meeting this morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I arrived in the classroom I asked Masato if there had been any progress after the meeting this morning.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あったぜ」
真人@「オレは、鈴を今からでも外野に回したほうがいいんじゃないのかって言ったんだけどな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I said that we should let her play outfield, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I said that we should let her play outfield, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だけど？」
真人@「鈴がリトルバスターズのエースらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Kyousuke said she's the ace of the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Kyousuke said she's the ace of the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「確かに恭介はそういうとこはねじ曲げない気がするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, he hates changing plans he's once decided on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, he hates changing plans he's once decided on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、どうなったの？」
真人@「恭介がタイムを何度でもかけろって言い出しやがった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He's promised he will allow her to call a time out every time she wants to during the match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He's promised he will allow her to call a time out every time she wants to during the match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「タイムをかけたら、オレたちがいつものように鈴の周りに集まってやれるだろ、だとよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝And every time she does it, we're gonna gather around her like we always do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝And every time she does it, we're gonna gather around her like we always do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「それで鈴が落ち着くまで、オレたちはいつものように馬鹿話」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝And then make stupid talk until she calms down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝And then make stupid talk until she calms down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほど…で、鈴はなんて？」
真人@「わかったって」
あ、何はともあれ、解決策が見つかったのならよかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It's good that we've finally solved the problem.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's good that we've finally solved the problem.

MESSAGE.JP: も、実際その方法で上手くいくかどうかは疑問だったけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm not really sure if that method is going to work, though...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm not really sure if that method is going to work, though...

MESSAGE.JP: して放課後に。
真人@「さて、練習だぜ、いくか、理樹」
んな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: 子がグラウンド隅に集まって雑談をしている。
MESSAGE.EN: The female members are chatting in the corner of the field.
MESSAGE.Translation: The female members are chatting in the corner of the field.

MESSAGE.JP: んな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「あの、棗さん」
恭介@「うん？」
鈴@「なんだ」
西園@「…お兄さんの方に用なのですが」
西園@「すみません、効率的ではありませんので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Pardon me, this is not a sensible way to call you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Pardon me, this is not a sensible way to call you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「お二人のことは下の名前で呼んでもよろしいでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Do you mind if I call you both by your first names?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Do you mind if I call you both by your first names?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「別に構わないが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't have a problem with that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't have a problem with that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なあ、鈴」
はしばらく考えたみたいだけど。
くり、と頷いた。
西園@「では。お言葉に甘えまして」
あ、と大きく息を吐く。
西園@「恭介…」
西園@「恭介、お兄さん」
恭介@「ぐは」
んでお兄さんをつける必要が…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't think there was a need to add ❛onii-san❜...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't think there was a need to add ❛onii-san❜...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「西園、もう一回言ってくれるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Nishizono, can you say that one more time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Nishizono, can you say that one more time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「恭介お兄さん」
恭介@「も、もう一回」
西園@「恭介…」
鈴@「いい加減にしろっ」
かっ。
が恭介の頭を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: She thunked him on the head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She thunked him on the head.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「この、馬鹿兄貴」
恭介@「…お前も、お兄さんとか言ってみろよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Why don't you call me Onii-san too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Why don't you call me Onii-san too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…お断りだ」
西園@「冗談はさておきまして」
恭介@「…冗談だったのか。残念だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...You were just kidding? That's too bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...You were just kidding? That's too bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「では、恭介さんで良いですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So, is it fine if I call you Kyousuke-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So, is it fine if I call you Kyousuke-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…ああ」
西園@「鈴さん」
鈴@「うん」
れでより親密になれるに違いなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: They must have become closer to each other than before.
MESSAGE.Translation: They must have become closer to each other than before.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、そうだ」
毬さんに絵本の話を聞こうと思ってたんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I just remembered I wanted to talk to Komari-san about that picture book.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just remembered I wanted to talk to Komari-san about that picture book.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、どうした？」
理樹@「小毬さんもう帰っちゃったかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did Komari-san already go back to her room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did Komari-san already go back to her room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「お菓子会」
理樹@「え？」
鈴@「部室」
理樹@「部室でお菓子会？」
りん、と音をさせて頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded and her bell rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded and her bell rang.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「へえ、じゃあみんなそれに出てるんだ」
鈴@「今日は何人いるか知らんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm not sure how many people there are today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm not sure how many people there are today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子のほうも、なんだか結束が出来てきてるんだなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Seems like the girls are becoming closer little by little.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Seems like the girls are becoming closer little by little.

MESSAGE.JP: とんど無理やり巻き込んだ形ではあったけど、そういうのがあるというのは、こっちとしてもなんか嬉しい。
MESSAGE.EN: This fact makes me happy because I'm the one who got them into this situation in the first place.
MESSAGE.Translation: This fact makes me happy because I'm the one who got them into this situation in the first place.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ、鈴は参加しないの？」
鈴@「…しない」
雑な表情を浮かべる。
MESSAGE.EN: She's got a complicated look on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's got a complicated look on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「くるがやとこまりちゃんに胸焼けにされる…」
理樹@「あー、なるほど」
次々と勧められるお菓子を断りきれないまま、引きつった顔で食べ続ける鈴の姿が目に浮かんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They keep offering her sweets and, unable to turn them down, she ends up munching away against her will.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They keep offering her sweets and, unable to turn them down, she ends up munching away against her will.

MESSAGE.JP: に小毬さん、悪意はないから断りづらいんだよなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's particularly difficult to resist Komari-san's offerings because she has only good intentions...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's particularly difficult to resist Komari-san's offerings because she has only good intentions...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でもさ、ちょっと顔出すくらいはいいんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can't you join in for a minute or two?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can't you join in for a minute or two?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「くるがやに捕まると逃げられなくなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If Kurugaya catches me, I can't run away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If Kurugaya catches me, I can't run away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…いやまあ、それはそうだけどさ」
膝の上に載せられたまま、もがく鈴の姿が想像できた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I imagined Rin struggling on Kurugaya-san's knees.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I imagined Rin struggling on Kurugaya-san's knees.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも来ヶ谷さんのああいう性格、結構好きだけどなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I rather like that personality of hers, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I rather like that personality of hers, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「お姉さんっぽいしさ。まあ自分でも言ってるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's like the big sister she likes to call herself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's like the big sister she likes to call herself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っ。
殴られる。
理樹@「い、痛いなぁ…なんで殴るのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, it hurts... Why'd you do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, it hurts... Why'd you do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしのほうが好きだっ」
理樹@「え？　いや、わけわかんないけど…」
鈴@「ふんっ」
走り去ってしまう。
ヶ谷さんは私のもの、とでも言いたかったのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Did she want to say that Kurugaya-san belonged only to her...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did she want to say that Kurugaya-san belonged only to her...?

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず小毬さんを探しに、部室に行ってみることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to visit the clubroom to see if Komari-san was there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to visit the clubroom to see if Komari-san was there.

MESSAGE.JP: 室の窓からは明かりが漏れていて、中からはみんなの声が聞こえてきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Light could be seen from the windows, and I heard voices coming from the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Light could be seen from the windows, and I heard voices coming from the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（結構みんな残ってるみたいだな）
とまずドアのほうへ回って、軽くノックした。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood before the door and gave it a knock.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood before the door and gave it a knock.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みんないる？」
声@「あー、入っていいデスヨ」
留佳さんの声がした瞬間。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard Haruka-san answer right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard Haruka-san answer right away.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「わぁーっ、わぁああぁーーっ!!」
すんっ。ばたんっ!!　がたたたたーっ!!
なにか中で色々起こっているようだった。
理樹@（な、なんだろう…）
りあえずドアを開けて中に入った。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened the door and entered the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened the door and entered the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 況を整理する。
MESSAGE.EN: I finally understood what was happening.
MESSAGE.Translation: I finally understood what was happening.

MESSAGE.JP: どうやら小毬さんがちょうど着替えていたみたいだ。
習中はスパッツを着用しているらしく、それを脱ぐ途中だった模様。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed that she'd been wearing spats during practice and was taking them off.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed that she'd been wearing spats during practice and was taking them off.

MESSAGE.JP: 留佳さんはクドと差し向かいでお茶を飲んでいる。ふたりは先に着替え終わっていたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was drinking tea face to face with Kud. They'd already finished changing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was drinking tea face to face with Kud. They'd already finished changing.

MESSAGE.JP: っていたのはその三人。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no one other than these three girls there.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no one other than these three girls there.

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんは突然僕が入ってきたので、慌ててスパッツを脱ぎかけのまま前のめりに倒れたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san suddenly noticed that I'd come in and fell forward in a panic as she was pulling the spats down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san suddenly noticed that I'd come in and fell forward in a panic as she was pulling the spats down.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…えーと」
理樹@「ごめん」
アから出ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I backed out of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I backed out of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「う、うああああーーーーーんっ!!　見られたぁーーーっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝U, uwaaaaaaaan!! I was caught with my pants down!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝U, uwaaaaaaaan!! I was caught with my pants down!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず落ち着いたようなので、もう一度中に入る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A few minutes later, I re-entered the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A few minutes later, I re-entered the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「はるちゃんひどいよっ!!　全然入ってよくなかったよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝That was mean, Haru-chan! I wasn't ready at all yet!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝That was mean, Haru-chan! I wasn't ready at all yet!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あ、いやー。私が全然オッケーだったから、つい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uh, well. I was ready, so I thought it was a-okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uh, well. I was ready, so I thought it was a-okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「まあ理樹くんもラッキーだったってことでどうかひとつ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Let's forget about it. Maybe today's Riki-kun's lucky day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Let's forget about it. Maybe today's Riki-kun's lucky day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ひ、ひとつもどうもしないーっ!!　今度は全部見られたぁーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I, I can't forget it!! He saw everything this time!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I, I can't forget it!! He saw everything this time!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こ、今度はですか？」
理樹@「いやまあ」
葉留佳@「え…前に見せたの？」
小毬@「え、ええっ？　み、みみ見せてないよぉ～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eh, eeehhh? No, I, I, I didn't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eh, eeehhh? No, I, I, I didn't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょっとした事故で」
理樹@「…ほんとにごめん」
小毬@「あ、うん…」
に手を当てて、はあとひとつ息を吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: She placed her hand on her chest and let out a great sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: She placed her hand on her chest and let out a great sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん」
小毬@「…見なかったことにしよう」
た、前の時と同じやり取り。
MESSAGE.EN: She said the same thing as before.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said the same thing as before.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「見られなかったことにしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝And let's pretend I wasn't seen by you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝And let's pretend I wasn't seen by you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、おっけー」
葉留佳@「今日は水玉でしたネ」
理樹@「いやあれはいちご柄なんじゃ」
葉留佳@「実に鮮やかなしまぱんでしたネ」
理樹@「いやまあ、しましまだったけどさ」
葉留佳@「小毬ちゃんにしてはおとなしい柄でしたネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I think they're a little too plain for her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I think they're a little too plain for her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あーうん、いつももっと凝ったの履いてると思ってた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess you're right. I thought she'd be wearing something more sophisticated.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess you're right. I thought she'd be wearing something more sophisticated.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うあああああーーーーんっ!!」
クド@「だ、大丈夫ですよ小毬さんっ!!　私には見えませんでしたっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It, it's okay, Komari-san!! I didn't see it!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It, it's okay, Komari-san!! I didn't see it!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何のフォローにもなっていない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No, Kud, I don't think that's going to help Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No, Kud, I don't think that's going to help Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「まあいいじゃんいいじゃん。ぱんつくらいさっ。元気出してっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, it's not a big deal. They're just panties. Cheer up!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, it's not a big deal. They're just panties. Cheer up!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…じゃあはるちゃん平気なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Then you wouldn't care if you were in the same situation?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Then you wouldn't care if you were in the same situation?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「え？　そんなんヤに決まってんじゃん。めっちゃ恥ずかしいし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh? Of course I would. It's way too embarrassing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh? Of course I would. It's way too embarrassing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うああーーんっ!!　やっぱり恥ずかしいーーっ!!」
小毬@「…うん、もう気にしない」
菓子を食べ始めたら落ち着いたらしい。
り替えの早さは天下一品だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like she really can reboot her mind that quickly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like she really can reboot her mind that quickly.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「んで、理樹くんなんか用？」
理樹@「あ、小毬さんにちょっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I need to talk to Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I need to talk to Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん？」
小毬@「あ…絵本かな？」
理樹@「ああ、何かわかった？」
小毬@「ごめんね、やっぱりわからないから、一回家に帰ってみるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Sorry, nothing. I think I'll go back home to get it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Sorry, nothing. I think I'll go back home to get it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「多分捨ててないから、どこかにあると思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I don't think I threw it away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I don't think I threw it away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　いや、わざわざそこまでしてもらうほどじゃ」
小毬@「いいんだ。私も久しぶりに見てみたいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's okay. I wanna read it again too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's okay. I wanna read it again too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「絵本ですか？」
小毬@「うん、絵本」
クド@「私もちっちゃい頃大好きでした～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I read a lot of them when I was little～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I read a lot of them when I was little～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「じゃあ現役で好きなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So, you like them even now, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So, you like them even now, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ、今でも好きですっ」
クド@「今のは『現役でちっちゃい』ってバカにされていましたかっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Did she mean I'm still little now? Was she making fun of me!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Did she mean I'm still little now? Was she making fun of me!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「いやいや馬鹿にはしてませんヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No, no, I wasn't making fun of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No, no, I wasn't making fun of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ただまあ、ミニマムだなぁと」
クド@「うぅ…ちーさいことはいいこともあるのです…わんだふぉー・すもーる・じゃぱんですよー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uu... Being small is sometimes better... It's a wandafo- sumo-ru Japan...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uu... Being small is sometimes better... It's a wandafo- sumo-ru Japan...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんがいるせいか、速攻で話題はずれていって、そのまま絵本の話に戻ることはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Because of Haruka-san, our topic drifted away from picture books and didn't return to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Because of Haruka-san, our topic drifted away from picture books and didn't return to them.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、グローブ持って来ちゃった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh no, I've brought my glove with me here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh no, I've brought my glove with me here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そのまま持って帰りゃあいいじゃねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why don't you take it to our room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why don't you take it to our room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん、忘れたら代えもないしねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm. I might forget to take it with me tomorrow and there's no substitute one in the clubroom, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm. I might forget to take it with me tomorrow and there's no substitute one in the clubroom, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「部室戻してくる。先に行っちゃっていいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll get back there. You guys go ahead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll get back there. You guys go ahead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ、わかった」
んなを先に行かせて、ひとりで部室に戻ることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I let them go and headed for the clubroom alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let them go and headed for the clubroom alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ…」
室の電気が点けっ放しになってる…。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw that the lights were still on in the room...
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw that the lights were still on in the room...

MESSAGE.JP: か残ってるんだろうか。
りあえず、中に。
理樹@「あれ、葉留佳さん？」
葉留佳@「しーっ」
理樹@「え？」
ょいちょい、と膝元を指差す。
小毬@「くかーっ…」
理樹@「…寝てるの？」
声になる。
葉留佳@「うん、よっぽど疲れてたんだろうねー」
あ、最近練習とか、ひとりでやたら張り切ってやってるしなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: No wonder since she's been practicing really hard recently...
MESSAGE.Translation: No wonder since she's been practicing really hard recently...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはわかったけど、何でこんな状況に？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But why is she on your knees?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But why is she on your knees?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「いやー、なんつーか油断してたっていうかですネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, it's something like I let my guard down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, it's something like I let my guard down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「最初肩に寄りかかられてたんだけど、気がついたらなんかこの体勢に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝At first she was just leaning on me, but before I realized she was in the current pose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝At first she was just leaning on me, but before I realized she was in the current pose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…まあ、小毬さんらしいねぇ」
葉留佳@「なんか起こしちゃ悪いし、っていうかそもそも起きないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's because I didn't want to wake her up in the first place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's because I didn't want to wake her up in the first place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「まったく油断もスキもありゃしませんヨ」
いながら、小毬さんの頭をなでる。
MESSAGE.EN: Laughing, she patted Komari-san on the head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Laughing, she patted Komari-san on the head.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…なんか、仲のいい姉妹って感じだねえ」
葉留佳@「…えー…」
葉留佳@「…そう、かなぁ…。姉妹なんか…実際は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I don't think so... Real sisters are not so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I don't think so... Real sisters are not so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「…ううん、確かにそうかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...No, forget it. That must be true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...No, forget it. That must be true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだか歯切れが悪く頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave me an evasive answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave me an evasive answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「だと、私おねえさんか」
理樹@「まあ、この構図だとね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure enough, when you look at it like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure enough, when you look at it like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「んでも小毬ちゃんは、一生懸命おねえさんを目指してるみたいだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It seems that she's been trying to be the big sister, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It seems that she's been trying to be the big sister, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
葉留佳@「鈴ちゃんとかクド公とかのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝For Rin-chan and Little Kud, that is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝For Rin-chan and Little Kud, that is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うーん」
う考えても荷が重い気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I think being their big sister would be too much for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think being their big sister would be too much for her.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「まあどっちかっていうと、みんなまとめてペットって感じだけどねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Either way, they and Komari-chan look more like pets to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Either way, they and Komari-chan look more like pets to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ほれほれ、がんばりこむすめー」
毬さんの髪を指先でくるくる丸める。
MESSAGE.EN: She curled up Komari-san's hair with a finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: She curled up Komari-san's hair with a finger.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あはは、唯ねえじゃないけど可愛いよねぇ」
葉留佳@「しかし起きないねコリャ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Just when will she wake up, by the way...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Just when will she wake up, by the way...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「起きるまでそうしてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you going to keep sitting there until she wakes up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you going to keep sitting there until she wakes up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「んー、それはつまらないナァ」
葉留佳@「…ふむ」
に手を当てて少し考える。
葉留佳@「理樹くん、ちょっと私のカバンとって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, will you get me my bag?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, will you get me my bag?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、これ？」
葉留佳@「そうそう」
ーブルの上においてあった鞄を手渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed over the bag which had been on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed over the bag which had been on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: 留佳さんは鞄からポーチを取り出し、さらにその中からペンを取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She produced a smaller bag from inside, and took out several pens from it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She produced a smaller bag from inside, and took out several pens from it.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「さって、寝てる間にらくが…お化粧しましょう～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Let's do graffi... I mean, do a makeup～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Let's do graffi... I mean, do a makeup～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや思いっきり落書きって聞こえたんだけど」
葉留佳@「だいじょーぶ、メイク落としも持ってきてるから」
んふんふーん、と鼻歌を歌いながらペンのキャップを取る。
MESSAGE.EN: Hun hun huun♪. She hummed and removed the cap from a pen.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hun hun huun♪. She hummed and removed the cap from a pen.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、ダメだってば…」
葉留佳@「んー…」
葉留佳@「まあ、理樹くんが止めるならしょうがないか」
ーチにペンを戻す。
