MESSAGE.Translation: She put the pens back into the small bag.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふえ？」
葉留佳@「あ、起きた」
小毬@「うーん、寝ちゃったのか～…」
葉留佳@「やっぱりいたずらしたほうが面白くなかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I think I should've played a trick on her. It would've been fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I think I should've played a trick on her. It would've been fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…面白い面白くないだけで行動決定するの止めようよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You shouldn't decide what to do by whether it's fun or not...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You shouldn't decide what to do by whether it's fun or not...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あははは、それはもう、性分ですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, it's my nature to do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, it's my nature to do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うにゃー…」
だ眠そうだった。
葉留佳@「いや、やっぱりいたずらするべきでしたって!!」
葉留佳@「ていうか、しよう」
毬さんのほっぺたをつまむ。
小毬@「むにゅう～…」
葉留佳@「あはははやわらかいー」
小毬@「はふぅ…」
りぐりと上下に動かす。
MESSAGE.EN: And she pulled them up and down.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she pulled them up and down.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ひゃへふぇ～」
めて～、と言ったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Sounds like she wanted to say ❛stop it.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Sounds like she wanted to say ❛stop it.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「目を覚ませ～寝たら死ぬぞ～」
理樹@「まあ、それくらいにしときなよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, it's about time to stop it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, it's about time to stop it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「えー、もう？」
小毬@「はひゅう…」
毬さんのほっぺたが赤くなっていた。
つまみすぎ。
葉留佳@「んじゃまあ、帰ろっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, let's go back to the dorm, shall we?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, let's go back to the dorm, shall we?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね」
小毬@「ふぁい～」
葉留佳@「ほらほらこまりん目覚まさないと死ぬよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Come on, Komarin. I told you to wake up, or else you'll die.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Come on, Komarin. I told you to wake up, or else you'll die.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぼけ眼をこする小毬さんを連れて、僕らは寮に戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: Although Komari-san was still only half awake, we headed for the dorms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although Komari-san was still only half awake, we headed for the dorms.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ばーかみょんみょんっ」
葉留佳@「あははは、すごいこれ可愛いっ、似合うっ」
小毬さんのほっぺにうずまきが。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She drew whirling patterns on Komari-san's cheeks.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She drew whirling patterns on Komari-san's cheeks.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「よーし次は口紅だー」
度は真っ赤な口紅を小毬さんの唇に塗ったくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She put lipstick on Komari-san's mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put lipstick on Komari-san's mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あ」
理樹@「いや、『あ』って…」
口紅が豪快にはみ出していた。
葉留佳@「まあ、こう修正しますかネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Okay, I can fix it like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Okay, I can fix it like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うわっ、これはやばいよっ」
どいことになった…。
葉留佳@「やばっ、一気にキモくなったっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh no, her face is creepy now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh no, her face is creepy now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「よしもっとキモくしまショウ」
理樹@「まだやるのっ!?」
葉留佳@「あははは、アーティストは常に追求し続けるのですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, artists keep searching for new inspiration.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, artists keep searching for new inspiration.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「目元もおしゃれチックにしようっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There is room for improvement under her eyes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There is room for improvement under her eyes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: イシャドーを取り出し、まぶたに線を引いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She drew lines on Komari-san's eyelids with eye shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: She drew lines on Komari-san's eyelids with eye shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「よし、黒目をつけて」
理樹@「う、うわあ…」
んどんすごいことになっていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: Her face was getting more and more awful...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her face was getting more and more awful...

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あははははははっ、すごいこれ、目開いてるみたいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahahahahaha, this is awesome. Looks just like her eyes are open.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahahahahaha, this is awesome. Looks just like her eyes are open.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ついでに熱血眉毛にしてみようっ」
葉留佳@「うわー、こりゃすでに小毬ちゃんじゃないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwaa, this girl is no longer Komari-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwaa, this girl is no longer Komari-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「鼻筋もくっきりっ」
理樹@「…いやまあ」
故僕は数分前に止めておかなかったんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why didn't I stop her a few minutes ago...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why didn't I stop her a few minutes ago...

MESSAGE.JP: バい、これは非常にヤバい…!!
MESSAGE.EN: Crap, this is worse than usual...!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Crap, this is worse than usual...!!

MESSAGE.JP: 、うわあぁ…。
わず言葉に詰まる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was at a loss for words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was at a loss for words.

MESSAGE.JP: れがあの小毬さんなんだろうか。
はなぜあの時に止めておかなかったんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why didn't I stop her while I had the chance...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why didn't I stop her while I had the chance...

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「これはなんと言うか、よく出来ましたネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It turned out quite well, don't you think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It turned out quite well, don't you think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕はノーコメントだよ…」
小毬@「…ふあ？」
葉留佳@「あ、起きた」
のメイクじゃ起きたように見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't seem to notice the make-up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't seem to notice the make-up.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「お目覚めいかがですかお嬢サマ」
小毬@「うーん？　寝ちゃったのか…」
葉留佳@「ハイ、鏡」
ぼけ眼をこすり。
小毬@「ほわぁっ!?　キモいっ!?」
を見るなり、びくうと後退る。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as she saw her face in the mirror, she jumped back in surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as she saw her face in the mirror, she jumped back in surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「な、なにこれぇえええぇぇーーー!?」
葉留佳@「いや小毬ちゃん」
小毬@「う、うあああーーんっ、私がキモいーーっ!!」
葉留佳@「いえいえ、すっごくぷりち…ぷふーっ」
小毬@「う、うえええーーんっ!!　すっごいキモいーーーっ!!」
葉留佳@「あははキモカワイイっすヨ」
小毬@「全然かわいくないーっ!!　キモいだけーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝No, not cute at all!! It's just awful!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝No, not cute at all!! It's just awful!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやまあ…」
小毬@「はるちゃんっ」
葉留佳@「ん」
小毬@「やったのはるちゃんっ!?」
葉留佳@「いや～つい出来心で」
葉留佳@「ほらメイク落としも…」
そごそとポーチを探る。
MESSAGE.EN: She searched in the small bag for them.
MESSAGE.Translation: She searched in the small bag for them.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「……あれ？」
小毬@「あれ？　じゃないーーっ!!　うええええーーん帰れないーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝What do you mean oops!! Ueeeeeeeeeen, I can't go home!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝What do you mean oops!! Ueeeeeeeeeen, I can't go home!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 結局小毬さんはキモメイクのまま女子寮に帰っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She ended up going back to the dorm with that makeup.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She ended up going back to the dorm with that makeup.

MESSAGE.JP: 間も空いたし、さてどうしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I've got some spare time. What should I do...?
MESSAGE.Translation: I've got some spare time. What should I do...?

MESSAGE.JP: 屋に戻って休んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I'm going back to my room and taking a rest...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I'm going back to my room and taking a rest...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なんか最近暑くね？」
夜、唐突な恭介の発言。
MESSAGE.EN: ...In the evening he suddenly spoke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...In the evening he suddenly spoke up.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、別にまだ暑くはないけど」
理樹@「夏どころか梅雨もまだじゃない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It isn't summer yet, never mind the rainy season...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It isn't summer yet, never mind the rainy season...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、俺のハートはいつでも熱いんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, maybe it's because my heart is always hot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, maybe it's because my heart is always hot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「またなんかいやな予感がするんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I've somehow got a bad feeling again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I've somehow got a bad feeling again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の手を見ると、なにやらホラー系の少年漫画が。
MESSAGE.EN: I spotted a horror shounen manga in Kyousuke's hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spotted a horror shounen manga in Kyousuke's hand.

MESSAGE.JP: またこれに影響を受けたに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He must be being influenced by that.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He must be being influenced by that.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は無言で立ち上がると、部屋から出て行こうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo stood up without a word and tried to leave the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo stood up without a word and tried to leave the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ待てって」
謙吾@「…恭介の気まぐれに、これ以上付き合ってる時間はないんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...I don't have any more time to kill with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...I don't have any more time to kill with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「謙吾。おまえに足りないのはゆとりだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo. What you need is time to take it easy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo. What you need is time to take it easy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「張り詰めた糸は刀の一振りでたやすく切れる。しかし、押さえのない、風になびく糸を切るのは至難の業だろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's easy to cut a strained string by just one swing of a katana sword. It's difficult to cut a string loosely waving in the wind, however.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's easy to cut a strained string by just one swing of a katana sword. It's difficult to cut a string loosely waving in the wind, however.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「何が言いたいんだ」
恭介@「だからさ、ちょっとここいらでゆるく遊べるイベントでも考えてみたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I've thought of a fun event to do to loosen up a little.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I've thought of a fun event to do to loosen up a little.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾はひとつ息を吐くと、再び元座っていた位置に腰を落ち着けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo sighed and sat back down where he had just been.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo sighed and sat back down where he had just been.

MESSAGE.JP: こういうときの恭介に、何を言っても無駄だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Once Kyousuke gets into this state of mind, there's nothing you can say to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Once Kyousuke gets into this state of mind, there's nothing you can say to him.

MESSAGE.JP: げようと思っても、なんだかんだで結局、最後には参加させられてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if we try to escape, we always end up following him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if we try to escape, we always end up following him.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ふっ…俺のハートだって、いつでも熱い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Phg... My heart is always hot as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Phg... My heart is always hot as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「今、俺はこれを冷ましてくれるものを求めている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And I'm looking to cool it down right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And I'm looking to cool it down right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうだ、これからみんなで滝行にでもいかないか!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Guys, let's go line up under a waterfall!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Guys, let's go line up under a waterfall!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いかねぇよ…」
謙吾@「なにい？　理樹はどうだ？」
理樹@「ごめん…遠慮しておくよ」
謙吾@「恭介は」
恭介@「わりぃが…こっちは滝行なんかと比べものにならないぐらい冷えるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝My game is gonna make you much cooler than that training.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝My game is gonna make you much cooler than that training.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうする？」
謙吾@「もちろんそっちだ！　滝行を超えるなんて、うわわぁああぁ、想像するだけでも興奮する！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Of course I do! Even better than a waterfall? Wow, I'm getting excited just imagining it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Of course I do! Even better than a waterfall? Wow, I'm getting excited just imagining it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 段は滝行で興奮してるのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder, is training under a waterfall really that exciting?
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder, is training under a waterfall really that exciting?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、今回はなんなのさ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what kind of game is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what kind of game is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「納涼肝試し大会だ」
真人@「きもだめし？」
理樹@「また季節外れなのがきたね…」
恭介@「気にするな。実はもうすでに準備は進めてある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Don't worry about that. Besides, I've already made the preparations.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Don't worry about that. Besides, I've already made the preparations.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「舞台は夜の校舎、参加者はチームを組んで回ってもらう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You guys will make a few groups and walk around inside the school building.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You guys will make a few groups and walk around inside the school building.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の校舎、と聞いた瞬間。
屋の片隅で猫を膝に乗せて漫画を読んでいた鈴が、音もなく部屋から出て行こうとしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin, who had been reading manga with a cat on her lap in the corner of the room, tried to silently slip out of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin, who had been reading manga with a cat on her lap in the corner of the room, tried to silently slip out of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おまえも参加」
介に鈴がつかまる。
鈴@「いやだっ、殺されるっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't wanna! I'm gonna be killed!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't wanna! I'm gonna be killed!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「別に殺されるようなのはでないと思うけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think you'll face any mortal danger there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think you'll face any mortal danger there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ういや、基本的に鈴はこういうの苦手だったなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it, she basically hates this kind of thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it, she basically hates this kind of thing.

MESSAGE.JP: 介からのミッションで夜の校舎に忍び込んだことはあるけど、あの時は猫たちもいたし、缶詰という餌もあったから奮起できたんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: She once snuck into the building in the dead of night. I think she was only able to do that because she went there with her cats and got cat food as a reward...
MESSAGE.Translation: She once snuck into the building in the dead of night. I think she was only able to do that because she went there with her cats and got cat food as a reward...

MESSAGE.JP: ういや、鈴はこういうの苦手だったなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it, she basically hates this kind of thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it, she basically hates this kind of thing.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いや、オレの知ってる怪談では普通に殺されてたぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But in a horror story I know all the characters get killed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But in a horror story I know all the characters get killed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「夜の東校舎の２階、女子トイレの右から二番目のドアをたたくとだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝When you go to the girls' restroom on the second floor of the east wing at night and knock on the second door from the right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝When you go to the girls' restroom on the second floor of the east wing at night and knock on the second door from the right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「聞こえて来るんだよ、声が…」
真人@「赤い衣着せましょーか…青い衣着せましょーか…黄色い衣着せましょーか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Want to wear a red cloth...? Want to wear a blue one...? Want to wear a yellow one...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Want to wear a red cloth...? Want to wear a blue one...? Want to wear a yellow one...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そう、低くすすり泣くような女の声でな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝The girl is asking that in a sobbing voice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The girl is asking that in a sobbing voice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「赤い衣、と答えると全身血まみれに、青い衣、と答えると血を抜かれて、全身真っ青にされて殺されるんだそうだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If you choose red, you'll be covered in your own blood. If you choose blue, she sucks all the blood in your body until you die...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If you choose red, you'll be covered in your own blood. If you choose blue, she sucks all the blood in your body until you die...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「き、きいろは…!?」
真人@「黄色？」
分で言っておいて少し考える真人。
MESSAGE.EN: Although he's the one who came up with the story, he became uncertain himself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although he's the one who came up with the story, he became uncertain himself.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「大量のバナナを食わされて、全身が黄色に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If you choose yellow, she makes you eat bananas until your body turns yellow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If you choose yellow, she makes you eat bananas until your body turns yellow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なるかあぁぁーーっ！」
きぃ！
鈴のハイキックが真人の側頭部に炸裂。
恭介@「まあ、さっきも言ったが別にひとりで行けってわけじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝As I said, it's not that you have to go all alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝As I said, it's not that you have to go all alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「主催の俺を抜かすとメンバーは９人、三人一組で三チーム出来るな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm the host, so I won't be joining in. There will be nine participants, so we can make three groups of three people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm the host, so I won't be joining in. There will be nine participants, so we can make three groups of three people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「バスターズ全員参加ってこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mean all the Little Busters members?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mean all the Little Busters members?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ、多いほうが面白いだろ」
恭介@「んじゃ、みんなにメール出すわ。三十分後渡り廊下に集合な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm emailing them, I'll see you guys at the connecting corridor in thirty minutes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm emailing them, I'll see you guys at the connecting corridor in thirty minutes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんか洒落にならなそうなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have a feeling this won't turn out well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have a feeling this won't turn out well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつくだけでもこういうのが苦手そうなのは、メンバーの半数近くを占めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: It doesn't take a genius to figure out that half the members would be bad with this kind of thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: It doesn't take a genius to figure out that half the members would be bad with this kind of thing.

MESSAGE.JP: 十分後、女子寮組も全員渡り廊下に集まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Thirty minutes later, the entire Little Busters team was gathered in the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thirty minutes later, the entire Little Busters team was gathered in the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よし、揃ったな」
介は言いながら、９人の前に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: He stood up in front of the nine of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: He stood up in front of the nine of us.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「はいっ、恭介さん、質問ですっ」
恭介@「何だ、小毬」
小毬@「私なんで集まったのか聞いてないのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I didn't hear the reason why we had to come here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I didn't hear the reason why we had to come here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、そのほうが色々盛り上がるだろ」
小毬@「うーん？」
いながら恭介は何か巻物のような布を取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: He took out some kind of rolled-up cloth.
MESSAGE.Translation: He took out some kind of rolled-up cloth.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「あ、理樹ちょっとそっち持って」
理樹@「え？　うん」
それをだー、と走って広げる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We opened what turned out to be a banner.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We opened what turned out to be a banner.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「第一回リトルバスターズキモ試しでホラー・ＮＯ・ＲＹＯ！大会～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Welcome to ❛Test Your Courage While Enjoying a Spirited Evening of Fun and Horror the Little Busters' Way,❜ episode one. To put it simply, we're going to do a trial of courage.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Welcome to ❛Test Your Courage While Enjoying a Spirited Evening of Fun and Horror the Little Busters' Way,❜ episode one. To put it simply, we're going to do a trial of courage.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「はい拍手～」
ぱらぱらと拍手が上がる。
謙吾@「ヒャッホウ！」
び上がるほどテンションが高いのが約一名。
MESSAGE.EN: Only one guy jumped up in excitement.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only one guy jumped up in excitement.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、恭介さん、私も質問ですっ」
恭介@「なんだねクド君」
クド@「キモ試しとはなんでしょうか？」
小毬@「クーちゃん、それはあれだよ」
小毬@「こう、キリで指の間をだんだんだんってつついて見たり、タバコの火を目にどれだけ近づけられるか試すんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝You can find out how brave you are through it. You have to tap an ice pick in-between your fingers, or move a live cigarette as close to your eyes as you can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝You can find out how brave you are through it. You have to tap an ice pick in-between your fingers, or move a live cigarette as close to your eyes as you can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「って恭介さんそんなのやるですかー!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝A-are we really going to do those things, Kyousuke-san!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝A-are we really going to do those things, Kyousuke-san!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「やるですかー!?」
恭介@「いや…やらんが…」
なんか自分で言って激しく勘違い＋１。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The second case of someone misleading themselves with their own explanation.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The second case of someone misleading themselves with their own explanation.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、俺が色々校舎内に仕掛けたから、ちょいと回ってもらってキモを試すのが今回の趣旨だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I've set traps in the school building, and you guys will test your courage by walking around inside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I've set traps in the school building, and you guys will test your courage by walking around inside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「有り体に言ってオバケ屋敷みたいなものだな。面白そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝To put it simply, it's something like a haunted mansion, isn't it? Sounds fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝To put it simply, it's something like a haunted mansion, isn't it? Sounds fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そういうこと」
恭介@「各階、チェックポイントに俺が札を用意してるから、それを探して出ること」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Every floor has one check point, and you must bring with you one of the cards I've left at each.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Every floor has one check point, and you must bring with you one of the cards I've left at each.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ゴールはここな。俺待ってっから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The goal is here. I'll be waiting for you guys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The goal is here. I'll be waiting for you guys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「おおぉ～なんか本格的で楽しそうじゃんかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ohhh～, that sounds like it'll be a real blast!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ohhh～, that sounds like it'll be a real blast!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「あ、あの…」
ずおずと手を上げる。
恭介@「ん、なんだ」
西園@「…夜の校舎を歩き回るんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...We're going to walk around inside the building in the middle of the night?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...We're going to walk around inside the building in the middle of the night?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうだが」
西園@「わたし、怖いんですが…」
趣旨を理解していない人がいた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Looks like she's completely missed the point of this game.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Looks like she's completely missed the point of this game.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そりゃあまあ、怖がってくれなきゃ困るが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, well, it'd be a problem if you weren't scared.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, well, it'd be a problem if you weren't scared.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そ、そういうものなんですか…」
たしてこの集まりは、まともにキモ試しという体裁を守ることが出来るのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if we'll be able to have a successful event with these people...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if we'll be able to have a successful event with these people...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…まあ、そういうわけでメンバー編成な」
理樹@「どうやって決めるの？」
恭介@「あ、わりい、考えてなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ah, sorry, didn't think about that at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ah, sorry, didn't think about that at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえ、必ずなんか忘れるよな…」
恭介@「んじゃ男三人リーダーで…じゃんけんで順番にふたりずつ選んでいく方式だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, the three of you men are leaders... And pick up two girls you want to go with after a game of rock-paper-scissors.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, the three of you men are leaders... And pick up two girls you want to go with after a game of rock-paper-scissors.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんかいやな意図が汲み取れるんだけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I kinda get what you're actually after here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I kinda get what you're actually after here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「別にいいだろ、好きなやつふたり選べるんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's the matter? You can choose any two girls you like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's the matter? You can choose any two girls you like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「好きなやつ？　好きなやつねぇ…えーと、オレは誰が好きだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Girls I like? Hmm... Well, who do I like...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Girls I like? Hmm... Well, who do I like...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ、真人言っちゃっていいのそれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwa, are you really going to choose, Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwa, are you really going to choose, Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あ？　べつにかまやしねえだろ、好きなやつくらい」
謙吾@「そうだな。つまり俺にも好きなやつを選ぶ権利があるという事だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's right. In other words, I also have the right to choose girls I like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's right. In other words, I also have the right to choose girls I like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「この場で告白大会なのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You guys will confess your loves right here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You guys will confess your loves right here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「お、いいっスねぇー、興味津々ですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh, that sounds awesome. I'm all ears.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh, that sounds awesome. I'm all ears.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あ？」
真人@「うおぉおぉおーーっ!!　言えるかそんなんーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uooooooooooooooo!! How could I say something like that right here!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uooooooooooooooo!! How could I say something like that right here!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 、やっと気付いた…。
理樹@「ちょっとちょっと、何でこっちみるのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, why are you staring at me...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, why are you staring at me...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「いや、俺なら誰を選ぶかと悩んでいたら、おまえを見ていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I wondered who I should get and found myself looking at you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I wondered who I should get and found myself looking at you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええ…せめて女の子を選んであげてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehh... you should choose your partners from those girls...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehh... you should choose your partners from those girls...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「悪くない、と思います」
理樹@「いや悪いよっ」
真人@「ざけんなっ!!　オレのほうが好きだっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Screw you, Kengo!! I love him much more than you do!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Screw you, Kengo!! I love him much more than you do!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「モテモテだな」
理樹@「ああ…」
んだかめまいが…。
謙吾@「…別に俺は最後に残ったふたりで構わんが」
真人@「ああ？　てめえだけ逃げる気かよっ！　ちゃんと選べよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? Are you running away, bastard? Just choose!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? Are you running away, bastard? Just choose!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえのようによこしまな意図はないといっているだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I just want to make it clear that I don't harbor any bad intentions unlike you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I just want to make it clear that I don't harbor any bad intentions unlike you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んじゃオレだってそんなもんねえよ！」
理樹@「それじゃ決まらないからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We can't do anything if this goes on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We can't do anything if this goes on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「なんでもいいが早くしてもらえるか？　もう夜もだいぶ遅いしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Whatever's fine, but can you guys decide please? It's late at night already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Whatever's fine, but can you guys decide please? It's late at night already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、ごめん…」
恭介@「じゃあ、理樹」
恭介@「とりあえずおまえが先に決めて出発しろよ」
理樹@「あー、うん…」
て、誰にしようか。
理樹@「じゃ、小毬さん」
小毬@「おっけーですよ～」
理樹@「鈴、いこうか」
鈴@「いやだ…」
理樹@「いやまあ」
理樹@「葉留佳さん、いい？」
葉留佳@「あはははいいっすヨっ」
理樹@「クド、一緒に行く？」
クド@「わかりましたっ！」
理樹@「えーと、来ヶ谷さん」
来ヶ谷@「なかなかいい人選だな」
来ヶ谷@「うむ、まあ私に任せておけ」
理樹@「…西園さん、いけるかな」
西園@「わかりませんが、頑張ってみます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm not sure, but I'll give it a try...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm not sure, but I'll give it a try...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…早く決めろよ、理樹」
理樹@「あー、うん」
かなか決まらないなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not such an easy decision.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not such an easy decision.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうした？」
理樹@「なかなか決まらなくてさ…」
真人@「ぱぱっと決めちまえばいいじゃねえか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Just pick them, it's no big deal...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just pick them, it's no big deal...❞

MESSAGE.JP: あ、そうなんだけど。
来ヶ谷@「…優柔不断も度が過ぎるぞ、理樹君」
鈴@「早く選べ、うすのろっ」
理樹@「いやまあ…」
んか、選びたくないって言うか、この中にいないって言うか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't really want to choose, or maybe the right option isn't even listed...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't really want to choose, or maybe the right option isn't even listed...

MESSAGE.JP: あ、決めよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, I have to make a decision.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, I have to make a decision.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「理樹、いい加減にしろよ…」
理樹@「いや、そんなこと言われてもさ…」
真人@「んだ？　オレたちと行きてえってか？」
謙吾@「…俺はともかく、ルームメイトのおまえならあるかもな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...I can't speak for myself, but it stands to reason he'd want to go with you since you're roommates.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...I can't speak for myself, but it stands to reason he'd want to go with you since you're roommates.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なにい？　男だらけのキモ試し大会か？」
恭介@「凄まじく心躍らないタイトルだなそれ」
謙吾@「ふっ、だがそれも悪くない！」
理樹@「え、悪くないの…？」
理樹@「…ってわけなんだけど」
謙吾@「おまえ…そんなに俺たちと一緒がいいのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I never knew... you liked our company this much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I never knew... you liked our company this much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、まあ楽しくやろうよ」
真人@「さすが幼なじみだぜ。これが絆ってやつだよな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're indeed our awesome childhood friend, and this is our unbreakable bond, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're indeed our awesome childhood friend, and this is our unbreakable bond, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「よし、肩組んでスキップしながらいこうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Let's skip along with our arms around each other's shoulders.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Let's skip along with our arms around each other's shoulders.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それすごく歩きづらそうだから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That will make it hard to walk...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That will make it hard to walk...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、とりあえず普通に歩いて回ろうよ」
階、理科室。
MESSAGE.EN: The science lab on the first floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: The science lab on the first floor.

MESSAGE.JP: たーん、と音がして、がい骨がロッカーから飛び出してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: With a sudden loud sound, a skeleton fell over toward us from a locker.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a sudden loud sound, a skeleton fell over toward us from a locker.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うおりゃっ」
れをチョップで叩き返す真人。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato punched it right back in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato punched it right back in.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さっきからずっと反撃してるところ悪いけど、これそういうゲームじゃないから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm afraid this isn't that kind of game...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm afraid this isn't that kind of game...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なに？　じゃあどう対応すればいいんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? What am I supposed to do then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? What am I supposed to do then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「キモ試しなんだし、恐がってあげるのが正しい対応かと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is a test of your courage, so you're supposed to be scared...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is a test of your courage, so you're supposed to be scared...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ガキじゃあるまいし、こんなので恐がるかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Who'd be scared, I'm not a little kid any more...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Who'd be scared, I'm not a little kid any more...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おっとまた現れやがった、チョップ！」
謙吾@「こら、俺だ…」
理樹@「うわぁ…」
真人@「がい骨っぽかったからな、わりぃわりぃ」
謙吾@「わざとだな…」
真人@「違うってばよっ」
真人@「オレみたいに筋肉がついてなくて、ガリガリだから間違えたんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I just made a mistake, because unlike me you're so scrawny and don't have much muscle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I just made a mistake, because unlike me you're so scrawny and don't have much muscle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おっと筋肉お化けだ」
ョップを仕返す。
真人@「なんだよ、筋肉お化けって！　喜ぶべきなのか、怒るべきなのか、すげぇリアクションに困るじゃねぇかよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, I'm a muscle monster!? How should I react to that? Should I be happy or angry?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, I'm a muscle monster!? How should I react to that? Should I be happy or angry?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「あほだな…」
ダグダな上に険悪だ…。
局そんなノリのまま、キモ試しの夜は更けていった…。
MESSAGE.EN: And just like that, the night went on...
MESSAGE.Translation: And just like that, the night went on...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ってわけなんだけど」
謙吾@「おまえ…そんなに俺たちと一緒がいいのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I never knew... you liked our company this much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I never knew... you liked our company this much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、まあ楽しくやろうよ」
真人@「さすが幼なじみだぜ。これが絆ってやつだよな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're indeed our awesome childhood friend, and this is our unbreakable bond, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're indeed our awesome childhood friend, and this is our unbreakable bond, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ああ、その通りだ。絆だ」
真人@「よし、肩組んでスキップしながらいこうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Let's skip along with our arms around each other's shoulders.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Let's skip along with our arms around each other's shoulders.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おうとも！」
たりが僕を挟んで肩を組んでくる。足が宙に浮く。
MESSAGE.EN: As the two of them put their arms around my shoulders, my feet were lifted off the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: As the two of them put their arms around my shoulders, my feet were lifted off the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: その状態でスキップされると、船酔いでもしたように吐き気が催してくる…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And then they started skipping along. It made me feel seasick and I wanted to throw up...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And then they started skipping along. It made me feel seasick and I wanted to throw up...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「よし、いいぞ。これを絆スキップと名付けよう！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝This is awesome. I'll call this bond-skipping.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝This is awesome. I'll call this bond-skipping.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おえっ」
謙吾@「すまん…」
真人@「まさか絆スキップがこんな弊害を生むとは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I never thought bond-skipping would make you sick...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I never thought bond-skipping would make you sick...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうする、この絆スキップ。俺とおまえでなら続けられるが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What are we gonna do? Do you think we can continue without him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What are we gonna do? Do you think we can continue without him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…理樹がいない絆スキップになんの意味がある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Do you think there is a point in doing this without him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Do you think there is a point in doing this without him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「オーケーもう何も言わなくていい。理樹の回復を待とう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Say no more. Let's wait up until he recovers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Say no more. Let's wait up until he recovers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の後、もう一度絆スキップを試みてみるも、また僕は激しい吐き気に襲われるのだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: After that we tried skipping along like that again, and I felt like throwing up once again...
MESSAGE.Translation: After that we tried skipping along like that again, and I felt like throwing up once again...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おえっ」
謙吾@「やっぱりダメか…」
真人@「…絆スキップは封印か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...We need to seal away this way of skipping...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...We need to seal away this way of skipping...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「むぅ…やむをえまい」
うしてキモ試しの夜はよくわからないまま更けていった…。
MESSAGE.EN: And just like that, the night went on...
MESSAGE.Translation: And just like that, the night went on...

MESSAGE.JP: たり目は…
理樹@「じゃ、小毬さん」
小毬@「おっけーですよ～」
理樹@「鈴、いこうか」
鈴@「いやだ…」
理樹@「いやまあ」
理樹@「葉留佳さん、いい？」
葉留佳@「あはははいいっすヨっ」
理樹@「クド、一緒に行く？」
クド@「わかりましたっ！」
理樹@「えーと、来ヶ谷さん」
来ヶ谷@「なかなかいい人選だな」
来ヶ谷@「うむ、まあ私に任せておけ」
理樹@「…西園さん、いけるかな」
西園@「わかりませんが、頑張ってみます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm not sure, but I'll give it a try...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm not sure, but I'll give it a try...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「んじゃ、そのメンバーな」
理樹@「うん」
理樹@「でも後のふたりが絶対決まらなさそうだから、あみだ作ってからね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll just draw lots for those two guys before we go, or I don't think they'll ever be able to decide their partners...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll just draw lots for those two guys before we go, or I don't think they'll ever be able to decide their partners...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「律儀だよな、おまえ…」
恭介@「じゃあ、俺ゴールで待ってっから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll wait for you guys here at the goal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll wait for you guys here at the goal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ、うん」
というわけで、探索開始。
っ暗な校舎内に侵入する。
MESSAGE.EN: The three of us snuck into the dark school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: The three of us snuck into the dark school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわあ…」
元が心許ないほどの暗闇。
は恭介から受け取った懐中電灯のスイッチを入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned on the flashlight that Kyousuke had given me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned on the flashlight that Kyousuke had given me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「んじゃ、行こうか」
いてくる二人に声をかける。
小毬@「おっけーごーですよ～」
てっきり怖がりまくりだと思っていた小毬さんが、なんかやる気モードに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I had thought Komari-san would get overly scared, but she looks fine.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had thought Komari-san would get overly scared, but she looks fine.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「小毬さん、平気なの？」
小毬@「うん、りんちゃんにくっついてるからだいじょうぶ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm okay, since I'm sticking to Rin-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm okay, since I'm sticking to Rin-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「そしたら私も怖くないし、私が怖くないからりんちゃんも怖くないよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝So long as she's not scared, I won't be scared either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝So long as she's not scared, I won't be scared either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: またなんかよく解らない理論。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I don't really understand how that works.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I don't really understand how that works.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…あたし怖い」
小毬@「ほわあっ!!　じゃあ私も怖いっ!!」
鎖反応らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like it's the domino effect.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like it's the domino effect.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやまあ…」
んか、僕が先導していくしかなさそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like I have to take the lead...
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like I have to take the lead...

MESSAGE.JP: ずは、特別教室棟の１階へ。
MESSAGE.EN: First we have to go to the wing with the special classrooms.
MESSAGE.Translation: First we have to go to the wing with the special classrooms.

MESSAGE.JP: 、そこで恭介からメールが。
MESSAGE.EN: Just then I got an email from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just then I got an email from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 一個目は理科室。後は札にヒントが書いてある』
MESSAGE.EN: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほど…」
科室かぁ…。
んか、怪しげな場所の定番だなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That sure is a stereotypically creepy place for him to think of...
MESSAGE.Translation: That sure is a stereotypically creepy place for him to think of...

MESSAGE.JP: らにある理科室のドアの前に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: We arrived at the door to the science lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arrived at the door to the science lab.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…ここ？」
理樹@「そうみたい」
鈴@「…理樹、入って探してこい」
理樹@「やっぱり僕なんだね…」
小毬@「ううん、私いきますっ」
小毬@「理樹君はりんちゃんのそばにいてあげてー」
理樹@「いや、別に無理しなくていいよ」
理樹@「恭介のことだから、洒落にならない仕掛けとか準備してそうだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's Kyousuke we're talking about here, I bet he's gone overboard with rigging the place with traps...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's Kyousuke we're talking about here, I bet he's gone overboard with rigging the place with traps...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ううん、たぶんだいじょうぶだから～」
理樹@「ちっともだいじょうぶに思えないんだけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think you'll be okay at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think you'll be okay at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: っから出てくるのかわからない、いつもの根拠のない自信。
MESSAGE.EN: I have no clue where her groundless confidence comes from.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have no clue where her groundless confidence comes from.

MESSAGE.JP: は僕の服の裾を掴んだまま黙ってるだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was grabbing my shirt in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was grabbing my shirt in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「じゃあ、行きますっ」
アの前に立ち、ひとつ深呼吸をする。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood in front of the door and took a deep breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood in front of the door and took a deep breath.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、ドアを開けた。
を覗き込む。
理樹@「…別に変なのは置いてないみたいだね」
小毬@「うーん、どっかに隠してあるのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm? Where's the note? Is it hidden somewhere?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm? Where's the note? Is it hidden somewhere?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんが理科室の中に入っていく。
理樹@「…ほんとにだいじょうぶ？」
小毬@「へいきへいき～」
間。
たああっ!!
小毬@「ひいやあああああああああああああっ!?」
ッカーから飛び出してきたがい骨に、小毬さんがものすごい声を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san cried out as a skeleton sprang out from a locker.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san cried out as a skeleton sprang out from a locker.

MESSAGE.JP: たたっ!!
たーんっ!!
小毬さん、瞬時に失神。
い骨はゆっくりとロッカーの中に戻っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The skeleton slowly returned back into the locker.
MESSAGE.Translation: The skeleton slowly returned back into the locker.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹っ、こまりちゃんが死んだっ」
理樹@「いや死んではいないと思うけどさ…」
げつないな、これ…。
とまず小毬さんを救出に向かう。
理樹@「小毬さん、だいじょうぶ？」
返事がない、ただの屍のようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no answer... She looked just like a corpse.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no answer... She looked just like a corpse.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こまりちゃん、死ぬなっ、生きろっ！」
しばしとほっぺたを張る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was slapping her on the cheeks.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was slapping her on the cheeks.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや鈴やりすぎじゃ…」
鈴@「ん」
小毬@「はっ」
を止めたところで小毬さん、復活。
MESSAGE.EN: Just when she stopped slapping her, Komari-san came to.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just when she stopped slapping her, Komari-san came to.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、多分あそこだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think I know where it is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think I know where it is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: に札を取りに行くことにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to grab the card first.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to grab the card first.

MESSAGE.JP: ッカーに近づくと、
MESSAGE.EN: When I got close to the locker...
MESSAGE.Translation: When I got close to the locker...

MESSAGE.JP: たがたん、と音を立ててがい骨が飛び出してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: yet again the skeleton jumped out of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: yet again the skeleton jumped out of it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかっててもびっくりするな、これ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It surprised me even though I knew it would appear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It surprised me even though I knew it would appear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず、がい骨の後頭部に張られていた札を一枚取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I took off the card that was stuck to the back of the skeleton's skull.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took off the card that was stuck to the back of the skeleton's skull.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おっけー、次行こう」
鈴@「理樹っ、こまりちゃんが今のでまた死んだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, Komari-chan died again because you did that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, Komari-chan died again because you did that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやまあ…」
い探索になりそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think this trip is going to be a long one...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think this trip is going to be a long one...

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うあーん、もうものすごいビックリしたよ～…」
理樹@「まあ、倒れたとき、頭とか打たなくてよかったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm glad you didn't hit your head when you fainted away...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm glad you didn't hit your head when you fainted away...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 活した小毬さんを連れて、２階へ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: We went up to the second floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: We went up to the second floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「でもなんかほっぺたが痛い～」
はばつが悪そうに顔を逸らしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin faced away from her. She must've been feeling guilty.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin faced away from her. She must've been feeling guilty.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ねえ、りんちゃ…」
鈴@「ほっぺた魔人のせいだ…」
小毬@「ま、まじん？」
わーものすごいごまかし方だ、これ…。
鈴@「こめかみ怪人もいる」
小毬@「ほわあ、怖いっ」
理樹@「いや、信じなくていい上に全然怖くないし、どこにツッコんでいいか解らないから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't have to believe it, and it's not even scary. I'm not sure what to comment on anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't have to believe it, and it's not even scary. I'm not sure what to comment on anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相性がいいのか悪いのか、よくわからないふたりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I don't know if those two girls are a great or awful match.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I don't know if those two girls are a great or awful match.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「さて、では行くとするか」
ヶ谷さんが恭介の用意した懐中電灯を手に取り、先頭に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san received a flashlight from Kyousuke and took the lead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san received a flashlight from Kyousuke and took the lead.

MESSAGE.JP: すが、来ヶ谷さんは頼りになる。
MESSAGE.EN: She sure is one we can really count on.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sure is one we can really count on.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「んで、どうしやすか姉御」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So Anego, what are we gonna do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So Anego, what are we gonna do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「そうだな、まずは特別教室棟にでも行くことにしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Right, let's head to the special classes wing to begin with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Right, let's head to the special classes wing to begin with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「りょーかいっス」
葉留佳@「ほら、理樹くんも行くよっ」
理樹@「ああ、うん…」
んか、これが最強パーティかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: This group just might be the strongest.
MESSAGE.Translation: This group just might be the strongest.

MESSAGE.JP: 別教室棟につくと、僕の携帯に恭介からメールが。
MESSAGE.EN: While we were on the way to the designated wing, I received an email from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: While we were on the way to the designated wing, I received an email from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 一個目は理科室。後は札にヒントが書いてある』
MESSAGE.EN: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほど…」
科室かぁ…。
んか、怪しげな場所の定番だなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That sure is a stereotypically creepy place for him to think of...
MESSAGE.Translation: That sure is a stereotypically creepy place for him to think of...

MESSAGE.JP: らにある理科室のドアの前に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: We arrived at the door to the science lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arrived at the door to the science lab.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「なるほど、ここか」
葉留佳@「んで、どうしやすか姉御」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So Anego, what are we gonna do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So Anego, what are we gonna do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「よし、私が行こう」
葉留佳@「りょーかいっス」
ヶ谷さんが懐中電灯で教室内を照らしながら、中を探っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Guided by the flashlight, Kurugaya-san searched around the lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: Guided by the flashlight, Kurugaya-san searched around the lab.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「さすが唯ねえは頼りになるねー」
理樹@「なんか僕の存在意義がないくらいだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. I don't think I even need to be here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. I don't think I even need to be here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 、不意にがたんっ、という音。
MESSAGE.EN: Out of the blue, we caught a sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: Out of the blue, we caught a sound.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわっ」
葉留佳@「ひゃあっ!?」
れば、ロッカーから標本のがい骨が飛び出してきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at the direction where the sound had come from and found a skeleton. It seemed like it'd come out of a locker.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at the direction where the sound had come from and found a skeleton. It seemed like it'd come out of a locker.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「なるほど、ここか。わざわざ教えてくれるとは親切なことだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see. It's here. Thank you for going to the trouble of showing us the location.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see. It's here. Thank you for going to the trouble of showing us the location.❞

MESSAGE.JP: まったく動じる様子もないまま、がい骨の後頭部から札を一枚取り、こっちに戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She unemotionally peeled off a card from the back of the skeleton's skull and returned back to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She unemotionally peeled off a card from the back of the skeleton's skull and returned back to us.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「いやいや、せっかくだからそのまま二人で先進むか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh please, it's such a great opportunity so just go on without minding me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh please, it's such a great opportunity so just go on without minding me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが僕の首にしっかり手を回して抱きついてきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Haruka-san was clinging to me with her arms locked firmly around my neck.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Haruka-san was clinging to me with her arms locked firmly around my neck.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「さて、次は２階だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝All right, let's go up to the second floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝All right, let's go up to the second floor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「んで、どうしやすか姉御」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So Anego, what are we gonna do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So Anego, what are we gonna do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…キミはさっきからそれしか言ってない気がするんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Why do you keep repeating the same words?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Why do you keep repeating the same words?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あ、いやー、なんかそれだけで話がどんどん進んでくから、つい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Er, because it seemed to be enough to keep things going...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Er, because it seemed to be enough to keep things going...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「じゃあ、ここからは理樹君に任せるとしようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Then, I'm leaving it to Riki-kun from here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Then, I'm leaving it to Riki-kun from here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええっ、何で僕がっ!?」
来ヶ谷@「一応リーダーだろう。ほら、懐中電灯」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're supposed to be our leader. Here, the light.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're supposed to be our leader. Here, the light.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんに懐中電灯を渡される。
理樹@「いや、だって恭介が勝手に決めただけじゃん…」
来ヶ谷@「いいじゃないか。ほら、私はキミら二人が怖がる様を、後ろからゆるりと眺めているから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's all right. I'm gonna enjoy watching you guys get scared from behind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's all right. I'm gonna enjoy watching you guys get scared from behind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ええーっ、そんな殺生っすよ姉御～」
来ヶ谷@「そのほうが面白いだろう。主に私が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's more fun that way. Especially for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's more fun that way. Especially for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: というわけで、今度は僕が先頭に立つことに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Thus, I became the leader this time around.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Thus, I became the leader this time around.

MESSAGE.JP: 階の札に書いてあった教室に向かう、階段の途中。
MESSAGE.EN: As we were going up the stairs to the next floor...
MESSAGE.Translation: As we were going up the stairs to the next floor...

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あ、あのさ…もうちょっとゆっくり歩いてくれないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝He, hey... Can you walk a little more slowly?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝He, hey... Can you walk a little more slowly?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 留佳さんに呼び止められる。
理樹@「あ、ごめん」
理樹@「…ていうか、葉留佳さん結構こういうの苦手なんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I didn't know you were weak against this kind of stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I didn't know you were weak against this kind of stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さっきまで普通そうにしてたから、得意なんだと思ってた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought you had no problems because you looked fine at first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought you had no problems because you looked fine at first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「いやー、唯ねえの後ろにいたら大統領でもぶっ飛ばす自信があるけどね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, when I was behind Yui-nee I thought I could beat up even the President...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, when I was behind Yui-nee I thought I could beat up even the President...❞

MESSAGE.JP: はそれを虎の威を借る狐という。
MESSAGE.EN: She's a fox in a lion's skin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's a fox in a lion's skin.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「普通に怖いから、こういうとこ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I really hate this sort of thing normally.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I really hate this sort of thing normally.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「理樹くんは逆にこういうの得意っぽいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You seem to be enjoying it though, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You seem to be enjoying it though, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやまあ、僕だって怖いけどさ」
葉留佳@「あ、やっぱ怖いよね…」
理樹@「う、うん…」
なぜか、そこで会話が止まる。
葉留佳@「あれ…」
葉留佳@「唯ねえ、どこ行ったの？」
理樹@「え？　来ヶ谷さんなら後ろに…」
り返る。
いない。
理樹@「あ、あれ…」
葉留佳@「あ、姉御ー、冗談キツいから～」
返事はない。
しっ。
理樹@「うわっ…」
葉留佳@「な、なんか音したよ…」
らららっ!!
理樹@「うわあっ」
葉留佳@「きゃあっ」
来ヶ谷@「…などと恐怖心を煽ってみたりもする」
来ヶ谷さんが教室から出てきただけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was only Kurugaya-san coming out of a classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was only Kurugaya-san coming out of a classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむうむ、夜の校舎で二人は大接近というわけだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu umu. The heat of the night, two people getting closer to each other in the dark school building...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu umu. The heat of the night, two people getting closer to each other in the dark school building...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have no idea what Kyousuke may have set up here...❞

小毬@「私、行くよ」

うやらクドの前でカッコつけたいようだ。

アの前に立ち、ひとつ深呼吸をする。

を覗き込む。

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...There doesn't seem to be anything odd here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...There doesn't seem to be anything odd here.❞

毬さんが理科室の中に入っていく。
理樹@「…ほんとにだいじょうぶ？」
小毬@「へいきへいき～」
間。
たああっ!!
小毬@「ひいやあああああああああああああっ!?」
ッカーから飛び出してきたがい骨に、小毬さんがものすごい声を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...a skeleton came out of a locker and sent her screaming.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...a skeleton came out of a locker and sent her screaming.

MESSAGE.JP: たたっ!!
たーんっ!!
小毬さん、瞬時に失神。
い骨はゆっくりとロッカーの中に戻っていく。

MESSAGE.Translation: The skeleton slowly returned back into the locker.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こ、小毬さんが小毬さんがっ!!」

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Just now, was that a wordplay on ❛fear❜...? Did she make a nice gag!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Just now, was that a wordplay on ❛fear❜...? Did she make a nice gag!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやそんな余裕はなかったんじゃないかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think she had time to think of that joke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think she had time to think of that joke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当パニクっているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: This must be her equivalent to a panic reaction.
MESSAGE.Translation: This must be her equivalent to a panic reaction.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ダメですっ！　やっぱり無理ですっ！　小毬さん助けて逃げましょうっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No! I just can't take it anymore! Let's take Komari-san and get out of here!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No! I just can't take it anymore! Let's take Komari-san and get out of here!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「れっつれすきゅー！」
ドが理科室の中に突入する。
間、椅子ががたんっ、と鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: Right after, a chair jumped with a loud clang.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right after, a chair jumped with a loud clang.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「うわあっ！　らっぷ音だかぽるたーがいすとだかそんなのですっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uwahh!? This must be a mystery sound made by a poltergeist or something!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uwahh!? This must be a mystery sound made by a poltergeist or something!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's just your cloak that caught the chair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「違いますっ、これはごーすと的な何かの仕業ですっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, it's not! This must be the doing of a ghost or something like that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, it's not! This must be the doing of a ghost or something like that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「うわああ壁に何か新手の動くものがっ!?　誰ですかあなたはっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uwahhh! Something's moving by the wall!! Who is it!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uwahhh! Something's moving by the wall!! Who is it!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはクドの影だと思うんだ」
クド@「ここはもう呪われていますっ！　かーすど理科室です！　今すぐ逃げましょうっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This place is cursed! It's a kaasudo science lab! We must escape right now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This place is cursed! It's a kaasudo science lab! We must escape right now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: き戸に駆け寄る。
MESSAGE.EN: She ran toward the other door of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: She ran toward the other door of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「うあああ開きませんっ！」
理樹@「そっちはロックかかってるから、そりゃ開かないよね」
クド@「もうだめですっ！　ＮＯ！　ＲＹＯ！　どころかＯＮ！　ＲＹＯ！　を引き寄せてしまいましたっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That does it! This is not a spirited evening! It's become a spirit evening!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That does it! This is not a spirited evening! It's become a spirit evening!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はっ、今のはちょっとねいてぃぶっぽい発音じゃなかったですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh. Did I sound like a native English speaker just now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh. Did I sound like a native English speaker just now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやそんなこと聞かれても…」
クド@「脱出ですっ！　科学特捜隊のアラシヤマ隊員のごとく脱出ですっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's dash out! Let's dash like Arashiyama of the Science Patrol!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's dash out! Let's dash like Arashiyama of the Science Patrol!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドっていくつだっけ…」
下に飛び出し、ばたばたとマントをなびかせながらクドが走っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud dashed out of the lab and ran down the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud dashed out of the lab and ran down the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: んっ。
クド@「はうっ!?」
金ダライが落下、クドの脳天を直撃。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A metal basin dropped on her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A metal basin dropped on her head.

MESSAGE.JP: のままぱったりと倒れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She fell flat down on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She fell flat down on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 、恭介からメールが。
MESSAGE.EN: At that moment, I got another email from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that moment, I got another email from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに逃げようとするとトラップが発動するから注意しろ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Watch out by the way, there are traps set in case you try to run away.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Watch out by the way, there are traps set in case you try to run away.]

MESSAGE.JP: いよ、恭介…。
とまず周りを見渡す。
理樹@「…えーと」
でに犠牲者が二名。
のすごい惨状になってしまった…。
来ヶ谷@「さて、では行くとするか」
ヶ谷さんが恭介の用意した懐中電灯を手に取り、先頭に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san received a flashlight from Kyousuke and took the lead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san received a flashlight from Kyousuke and took the lead.

MESSAGE.JP: すが、来ヶ谷さんは頼りになる。
MESSAGE.EN: She sure is one that we can count on.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sure is one that we can count on.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…暗いですね…」
園さんは恐る恐るといった様子でそれに続いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san spoke timidly, following in Kurugaya-san's steps.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san spoke timidly, following in Kurugaya-san's steps.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「明かりがないと足元も覚束ないだろう。離れないほうがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Step a bit further from me, you'll lose your footing if you don't walk in the light.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Step a bit further from me, you'll lose your footing if you don't walk in the light.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「は、はい」
まあ、来ヶ谷さんさえいれば何とかなりそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, I guess we'll be all right so long as we are with Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, I guess we'll be all right so long as we are with Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…直枝さんは」
別教室棟に向かう途中、西園さんに声を掛けられる。
MESSAGE.EN: On the way to the special classes wing, she spoke up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the way to the special classes wing, she spoke up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「直枝さんは怖くないんですか？」
理樹@「まったく怖くないわけじゃないけどね」
理樹@「三人いるならまあ平気かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But we should be fine as long as we stick close to each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But we should be fine as long as we stick close to each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「それでも、やっぱり怖いですよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Even so, it's scary after all, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Even so, it's scary after all, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、そりゃあ」
西園@「なぜ恭介さんはわざわざわたしたちを怖がらせようとするんでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Why is Kyousuke-san purposely trying to make us feel fear?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Why is Kyousuke-san purposely trying to make us feel fear?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…恭介はそういう人だからなぁ」
西園@「…理解できません」
西園@「怖いっていうのは、マイナスの感情です」
西園@「…ジェットコースターにしろお化け屋敷にしろ、自分から進んで怖がろうとする人たちがいるのも、わたしには解らない事です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...There are those who love roller coasters or haunted houses out there. Why do they want to scare themselves? I don't understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...There are those who love roller coasters or haunted houses out there. Why do they want to scare themselves? I don't understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「それは違うぞ、西園女史」
来ヶ谷@「人々が求めているのは感情の起伏だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What people want are emotional ups and downs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What people want are emotional ups and downs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「心を動かされたいと思うからこそ、恐怖やスリルを味わいたがる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝They want to taste fear and thrill because they wish for their hearts to be moved.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝They want to taste fear and thrill because they wish for their hearts to be moved.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…感動的な物語をみることも、それと同じ事だと思うが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...I suppose the same goes for reading tragic stories.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...I suppose the same goes for reading tragic stories.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「悲しい話というのは、キミの言うところのマイナスの感情ではないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝From your point of view, sadness is also a negative feeling, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝From your point of view, sadness is also a negative feeling, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「それは、そうかもしれませんが」
来ヶ谷@「美魚君も本を読むのなら、わかるのではないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm sure you can understand what I'm after, since you read books.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm sure you can understand what I'm after, since you read books.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「感情の動きの無いこと、それがいかに色彩の無いことか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You should already know how colorless things are, without being animated by feelings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You should already know how colorless things are, without being animated by feelings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…灰色がいかに寂しい色なのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...And how lonely the color gray is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...And how lonely the color gray is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんの言葉に、西園さんは押し黙ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: What Kurugaya-san said made Nishizono-san quiet.
MESSAGE.Translation: What Kurugaya-san said made Nishizono-san quiet.

MESSAGE.JP: には来ヶ谷さんの言ってる事がよく解らなかったけど、何か深い話であることは想像ができる。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't completely understand what she was saying, but I could only imagine it was something deep.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't completely understand what she was saying, but I could only imagine it was something deep.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「思うこと、一つ叶えばまた一つ。求めてこそ彩るものもあるということさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Wanting things and fulfilling them one by one. Desires are what give your life color.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Wanting things and fulfilling them one by one. Desires are what give your life color.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まあ、そういうわけだから、おねーさんはキミらを怖がらせる側に回る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Therefore, this Onee-san is going to switch sides and scare you guys up now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Therefore, this Onee-san is going to switch sides and scare you guys up now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやどういうわけなのさっ!!」
たしてもただの前振りかっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: Was all that dithyramb just another excuse to do as she pleases!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Was all that dithyramb just another excuse to do as she pleases!!

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、まあせいぜい私のもたらす恐怖に慄くがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha. I hope you guys will enjoy the thrills I'm going to give you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha. I hope you guys will enjoy the thrills I'm going to give you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言い残し、来ヶ谷さんは何処かへと姿を消した。
理樹@「まったく、あの人は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I have no idea what she's thinking...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I have no idea what she's thinking...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ど、どうしましょうか」
理樹@「しょうがないよ、二人で行こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no other way. Let's go ahead without her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no other way. Let's go ahead without her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…は、はい」
人で廊下を進んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us walked down the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us walked down the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: と、僕の携帯が鳴った。
時に、西園さんに服の袖を掴まれていることに気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: In response, Nishizono-san immediately grasped onto my sleeve.
MESSAGE.Translation: In response, Nishizono-san immediately grasped onto my sleeve.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの、西園さん」
西園@「はい」
理樹@「…離してもらえるかな、服」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Could you let go of my clothes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Could you let go of my clothes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「……はっ」
西園@「さ…触らないでくださいっ」
理樹@「えーっ、掴んできてたの西園さんの方じゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehhh, you're the one who gripped me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehhh, you're the one who gripped me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なぜか非難の目で見られる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I don't know why but, she's staring at me with accusation.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I don't know why but, she's staring at me with accusation.

MESSAGE.JP: あ、いいか…。
とまず、着信は恭介からのメールだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I took out my cellphone, and found an email from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took out my cellphone, and found an email from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 一個目は理科室。後は札にヒントが書いてある』
MESSAGE.EN: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほど…」
科室かぁ…。
んか、怪しげな場所の定番だなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That sure is a stereotypically creepy place for him to think of...
MESSAGE.Translation: That sure is a stereotypically creepy place for him to think of...

MESSAGE.JP: らにある理科室のドアの前に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: We arrived at the door to the science lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arrived at the door to the science lab.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えーと、ここみたいなんだけど」
西園@「は、入るんですか」
理樹@「待っててもいいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can stay and wait for me here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can stay and wait for me here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「その方が怖いです…一緒に行きます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's much scarier... I'll go with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's much scarier... I'll go with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 科室の中に入る。
理樹@「…別に、何も変わらないみたいだけど…」
らららぴしゃんっ!!
然の音。
西園@「きゃっ…」
た西園さんに服を掴まれる。
みれば、ドアが閉まっただけだった。
理樹@「び、びっくりしすぎだからさ…」
や、待てよ。
なんで突然ドアが閉まるんだ。
っておいたら動くようなドアでもないし、自動ドアなんてものでもない。
MESSAGE.EN: That wasn't a swinging door, nor was it an automatic door.
MESSAGE.Translation: That wasn't a swinging door, nor was it an automatic door.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「待って、なんか聞こえる…」
ピーカーからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was coming from the speaker.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was coming from the speaker.

MESSAGE.JP: それは。
理樹@「う、うわあ…っ」
西園@「ひぃっ…!?」
ひたすらに人間の恐怖心をあおる音声』が聞こえてきた。※人道的見地により音声はカットさせて頂いております。
MESSAGE.EN: What we heard was a [voice to instill fear from the deepest pits of man's subconscious]. For humanitarian reasons, the voice is not relayed here.
MESSAGE.Translation: What we heard was a [voice to instill fear from the deepest pits of man's subconscious]. For humanitarian reasons, the voice is not relayed here.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「な、なんだこれっ!?」
っ。
教室の天井にある、ふたつのＴＶモニタの電源が入る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The two TVs hanging from the ceiling flickered on.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The two TVs hanging from the ceiling flickered on.

MESSAGE.JP: の映像は…。
理樹@「ぎゃあああああああっっ!?」
西園@「………っ!?（すでに声にならない）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........!? (She's even lost her voice out of fear).❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........!? (She's even lost her voice out of fear).❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんとか理科室から脱出をする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Somehow or the other we managed to escape from the science lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Somehow or the other we managed to escape from the science lab.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんは真っ青な顔で、肩で息をしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She's panting heavily with a completely pale face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's panting heavily with a completely pale face.

MESSAGE.JP: 分僕も同じことだろう。
来ヶ谷@「やあ、いかがだったかなお二方」
理樹@「トラウマになるよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did you think that'd make us happy!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did you think that'd make us happy!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんはまだ放心状態だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She is still completely out of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She is still completely out of it.

MESSAGE.JP: とまず来ヶ谷さんがアイテムを探し出していたようだったので、そのまま２階に向かうことに。
MESSAGE.EN: Since Kurugaya-san had already found the note, we decided to go up to the second floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since Kurugaya-san had already found the note, we decided to go up to the second floor.

MESSAGE.JP: っ暗な校舎内に侵入する。
理樹@「うわあ…」
元が心許ないほどの暗闇。
MESSAGE.EN: It's so dark that we can hardly see our own steps.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's so dark that we can hardly see our own steps.

MESSAGE.JP: は恭介から受け取った懐中電灯のスイッチを入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned on the flashlight Kyousuke had given me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned on the flashlight Kyousuke had given me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「んじゃ、行こうか」
いてくる二人に声をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I speak up to the other members.
MESSAGE.Translation: I speak up to the other members.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「おっけーごーですよ～」
葉留佳@「頼りにしてますヨ、りーだーっ」
なんか、賑やかなパーティになった。
外なのは、怖がりまくりだと思ってた小毬さんが、割と平気そうなことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: What surprised me was that Komari-san looked much less scared than I would've thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: What surprised me was that Komari-san looked much less scared than I would've thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「そういえば前ノート忘れて夜の校舎歩いたことがあってさ。あんときゃさすがに怖かったねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Come to think of it, a few weeks ago I left a notebook in my classroom and had to walk through the school at night to pick it up. That really was scary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Come to think of it, a few weeks ago I left a notebook in my classroom and had to walk through the school at night to pick it up. That really was scary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふええっ、ひとりでここ歩いたのっ!?」
あ、賑やかに話をしながら歩いてれば、確かに怖くはなさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, it doesn't feel that scary when we're chatting together like this.

理樹@「え？」
を澄ませてみる。
カナカナカナカナ…。
ヒッヒッヒッヒ…。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It seems to be coming from behind your back, Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh? If I show you my back I'll die.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm pretty sure it's a cassette player.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろに回りこんでみる。

さっと方向転換。
り込む。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Crap, are you trying to kill me, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Kill and Bill sound similar, don't they?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Kill and Bill sound similar, don't they?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「似てるけどどうでもいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, but that completely doesn't matter now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, but that completely doesn't matter now.❞

るっ、さっ、ぐるっ、さっ。

MESSAGE.Translation: She turned around. I turned around...

事に小毬さんには背を向けていた。

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not sure where you got that, but stop goofing around...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not sure where you got that, but stop goofing around...❞

、そこで恭介からメールが。

科室かぁ…。
んか、怪しげな場所の定番だなぁ…。

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're the one that can do it. Rather, you're supposed to do it. You're the truth of the world!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm... I don't know what you're saying at all, but I'll try.❞

気揚々と中に。

葉留佳@「ああああーーーっ!!」
わざとらしく葉留佳さんが叫ぶ。
た、びっくりさせようとしてるんだろうなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: She must be trying to scare Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ええええーっ!?」
毬さんはびくう、と振り返る。
間。
たぁっ!!

ッカーからがい骨が飛び出してきた。

っちを向いてた小毬さんには状況が掴めないらしい。

MESSAGE.Translation: Because she was looking at us, she didn't understand what was happening.

留佳さんは後ろのロッカーを指差す。
小毬@「ふえ？」
り向く。
骨はすでにロッカーの中に戻っていた。

毬さんがこっちに向き直ると。

MESSAGE.Translation: When she turns around to look at us...

MESSAGE.JP: たーーんっ!!
葉留佳@「うわああぁぁああぁぁーーっ!!　小毬ちゃん、後ろ後ろーっ!!!」
小毬@「ええええーーっ!?」
小毬さんが振り向く前に、今度は即座に戻る骨。

MESSAGE.Translation: ...Before she turned to face the skeleton, it went back in the locker.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「なんにもないってば～」
理樹@「…うんまあ」
は教室の中に入り、小毬さんの手から懐中電灯を受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I also entered the lab and took the flashlight from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also entered the lab and took the flashlight from her.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, this really is something you could expect from him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, this really is something you could expect from him...❞

後までなんだったか小毬さんには解らなかったらしい。

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…まあ、うまくいったよねぇ」
葉留佳@「ほえぇえぇ…」
砕け状態の葉留佳さん。

元が心許ないほどの暗闇。

いてくる二人に声をかける。

てっきり怖がりまくりだと思っていた小毬さんが、なんかやる気モードに。

MESSAGE.Translation: ...I thought she would be scared, but she looks full of motivation.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝No, I should be fine, as long as I'm chatting with Mio-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…そ、そうですね。お話しながら行きましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...T, that's a good idea. Let's not stop talking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...T, that's a good idea. Let's not stop talking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「というわけでれっつごーっ」
あ、割と何とかなりそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I suppose we'll make it somehow.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yeah, I wish we could turn the lights on.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's the curse of the corpse sealed inside the wall during the construction of the school building.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And there's a note saying ❛Where is my right arm?❜ still kept inside the safe in the principal's office.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Speaking of which, this school's foundation was laid on a mystic spot.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Things would appear there every night... this seems to be another ghost story passed on in the school.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Things like, dead people... that's what they say, but just imagining it makes me scared.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「でも、お話しながらだと気が紛れて、ちょっと怖くなくなりますね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But chatting like this sure is comforting, isn't it? I don't feel scared any more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But chatting like this sure is comforting, isn't it? I don't feel scared any more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「う、うあああああーーーーんっ!!　め、めちゃくちゃこわいいいーーーーーーっっ!!!」
西園@「…どうかしましたか、神北さん？」
理樹@「いやまあ…」
このふたり、めちゃくちゃ相性悪いよな…。

MESSAGE.JP: 、そこで恭介からメールが。

MESSAGE.JP: 一個目は理科室。後は札にヒントが書いてある』
MESSAGE.EN: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほど…」
科室かぁ…。
んか、怪しげな場所の定番だなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That sure is a stereotypically creepy place for him to think of...
MESSAGE.Translation: That sure is a stereotypically creepy place for him to think of...

MESSAGE.JP: らにある理科室のドアの前に立つ。

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Good luck. Me, I couldn't do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Good luck. Me, I couldn't do that...❞

気揚々と中に突入。

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だいじょうぶ、小毬さん？」
小毬@「へいきへいきー」
西園@「机から突然青白い右腕が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝A pale right arm might appear from a desk...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝A pale right arm might appear from a desk...❞

西園@「…出るかもしれないから気をつけてください、と言おうとしたのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...so please be careful, is what I wanted to say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...so please be careful, is what I wanted to say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや…そういうの言わないほうがいいと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... You shouldn't say something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... You shouldn't say something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…失礼しました」
小毬@「うえーんっ、やっぱり戻る～…」
間。
たああっ!!
小毬@「ひいやあああああああああああああっ!?」
ッカーから飛び出してきたがい骨に、小毬さんがものすごい声を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: A skeleton sprang out of a locker and sent Komari-san screaming.
MESSAGE.Translation: A skeleton sprang out of a locker and sent Komari-san screaming.

MESSAGE.JP: たたっ!!
たーんっ!!
小毬さん、瞬時に失神。
い骨はゆっくりとロッカーの中に戻っていく。

MESSAGE.Translation: The skeleton slowly rewound back into the locker.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あちゃあ…」
理樹@「しょうがないね、西園さん、中に入ろうか」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's go inside, Nishizono-san. There's no other way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…西園さん？」
立ったまま失神してる…。
とまず札を探して、さっさと２階に向かうとしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, we gotta get the note and go to the next floor...
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, we gotta get the note and go to the next floor...

MESSAGE.JP: は無言でその場に立ったままだ。

MESSAGE.Translation: She was standing still there in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こ、怖くない怖くない怖くない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's, it's not scary, not scary, not scary...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's, it's not scary, not scary, not scary...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh yes! There was that thing you're supposed to write on your hand at a time like this, that thing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh yes! There was that thing you're supposed to write on your hand at a time like this, that thing!❞

手をパーの形にしたクドはそれを鈴に突きだした。

MESSAGE.Translation: Kud turned over her hands and stuck her palms out toward Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 言のまま指で書く鈴。

MESSAGE.Translation: Rin wrote something on the palms without saying a word.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…えーと、なんですか？」
クド@「くち…に…あに…ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The kanji for mouth and... the one for big brother... right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The kanji for mouth and... the one for big brother... right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: く鈴。
クド@「って呪！　呪いじゃないですか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hey, they compound into the kanji for ❛curse❜!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hey, they compound into the kanji for ❛curse❜!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いっつ・あ・かーす！」

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, saying that won't magically turn you to stone... oh wait, it still means a curse!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, saying that won't magically turn you to stone... oh wait, it still means a curse!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 入る前から全力で怖がっているのかそうでないのかわかんないよクド…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Has Kud already spent up all her fear...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Has Kud already spent up all her fear...?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴、『いわう』は、しめすへんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, that's not how you write ❛good fortune,❜ you're using the completely wrong symbols.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, that's not how you write ❛good fortune,❜ you're using the completely wrong symbols.❞

理樹@「思いきり呪ってるよっ！」
ぁ、なんというかこういうコンビなんだよな、鈴とクド…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, this is the way it goes when you put Rin and Kud together...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, this is the way it goes when you put Rin and Kud together...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、あのっ」
理樹@「ん、なに？」

理樹@「いや、クドここにいるよ…」
クド@「あ、なるほど。すみません、こうですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, you're right. Sorry, let me give it one more shot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, you're right. Sorry, let me give it one more shot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…れっつごーりたーんほーむ！」
理樹@「こらこら、帰ろうとしないのっ！」
理樹@「…つまり助けを呼んでいいかってこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Are you saying you want to go call somebody to help us?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Are you saying you want to go call somebody to help us?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはこくこくと首を振った。
理樹@「いや、原則三人組だから、これ以上人増やしちゃまずいと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The group member limit is three, so I don't think we can get more people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The group member limit is three, so I don't think we can get more people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「大丈夫です、人じゃないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's okay since what I need are not people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's okay since what I need are not people.❞

クドがちょっと外に出る。
ぐ戻って来る。
